translated: then the yogi should resort to them without attachment.

original: ngag ni 'khyal pa la sogs pa @63b la yang ;
analyzed: ngag ni 'khyal pa la sogs pa @63b la yang ;
translated: Even in frivolous speech, etc.,

original: /'di dag kyang ni dam tshig rtogs bya nyid //
analyzed: /'di dag kyang ni dam tshig rtogs bya nyid //
translated: these are to be understood as pledges.

original: de nyid kyi phyir khyad par gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khyad par gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore, the special [pledge] is stated:

original: sgrub pa po zhes te 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa po'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po zhes te 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa po'o //
translated: The practitioner, who is the agent of the benefit of all beings.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la sogs pa yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la sogs pa yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one asks, Are the perfections vehicle, etc., also [pledges]?

original: theg pa mchog gi chos rnams la //
analyzed: theg pa mchog gi chos rnams la //
translated: The reply is: In the teachings of the supreme vehicle,

original: zhes te / theg pa chen po las /
analyzed: zhes te / theg pa chen po las /
translated: that is, in the Great Vehicle.

original: mchog dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: mchog dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la gnas pa la'o //
translated: The supreme is the glorious Guhyasamaja. Teachings are the phenomena that are the characteristics of the path.🔽One should abide in them. For a moment means for a short time.

original: 'di ni re zhig zhog la yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig zhog la yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
translated: Let this be set aside for the moment. The mother is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yum zhes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yum zhes so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is called the mother.

original: gang dang 'brel ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang 'brel ba yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, What is it connected with?

original: gsungs pa / sangs rgyas khyab bdag ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / sangs rgyas khyab bdag ste /
translated: The reply is: The buddhas, the lords.

original: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang 'od kyi shes rab kyi ngo bo la bla ma'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus nyid na /
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang 'od kyi shes rab kyi ngo bo la bla ma'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus nyid na /
translated: The nature of the wisdom of the natural light of the great guru-vajra-holder, by the guru’s instruction, at the time of the wisdom-knowledge initiation,

original: gnyis su med pa'i rnam pas bsten na 'dod chags la sogs pas mi gos so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rnam pas bsten na 'dod chags la sogs pas mi gos so //
translated: if one relies on it in a nondual manner, one is not sullied by desire and so forth.

original: grub par 'gyur ba yang de'i sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur ba yang de'i sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: And one will become accomplished, that is, a buddha.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: mal sogs pa 'brel pa dang tha dad pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: mal sogs pa 'brel pa dang tha dad pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of the conceptualization of the bed, etc., as connected or separate.

original: de ltar na phyugs la sogs pa yang de ltar thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na phyugs la sogs pa yang de ltar thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, even cattle, etc., will attain it.

original: blo can zhes te ji lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blo can zhes te ji lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “The wise” means those endowed with the wisdom that is the nature of things.

original: khyad par 'di dag dang bral na 'dod pas log par g-yem par gzhag go //
analyzed: khyad par 'di dag dang bral na 'dod pas log par g-yem par gzhag go //
translated: If one lacks these distinctions, one is said to engage in sexual misconduct.

original: des na phan tshun lung dang 'gal ba med de yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na phan tshun lung dang 'gal ba med de yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore there is no contradiction with the scriptures, because the objects are different.

original: 'gal ba de yang gcig la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba de yang gcig la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that contradiction is because of the focus on one.

original: de bzhin du gzhan bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag rnams la rtogs pa po'i nyes pas 'gal bar snang ba rnams la 'gal ba yongs su spang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag rnams la rtogs pa po'i nyes pas 'gal bar snang ba rnams la 'gal ba yongs su spang ngo //
translated: In the same way, in the case of other statements of the Transcendent Lord, one should eliminate contradictions that appear due to the fault of the understander.

original: de nas zhes pa la dbang po rtul po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin pas yongs su zin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa yun ring por theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa la sogs pa rnams rang gis skur ba 'debs pa'i
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la dbang po rtul po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin pas yongs su zin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa yun ring por theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa la sogs pa rnams rang gis skur ba 'debs pa'i
translated: Then, after that, those of dull faculties who are not taken care of by a spiritual friend, whose roots of virtue are not fully ripened, who for a long time have deprecated the Great Vehicle, and so on, are unable to utter the words of their own deprecation.

original: ngag brjod par mi nus pa rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i skur ba 'debs pa'i sems yongs su shes pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: ngag brjod par mi nus pa rnams 'chad par 'gyur ba'i skur ba 'debs pa'i sems yongs su shes pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: They are those who, after fully understanding the mind of deprecation that will be explained,

original: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar skur ba 'debs pa'i ngag 'di yin zhes brgal ba dang lan skabs brgyud pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar skur ba 'debs pa'i ngag 'di yin zhes brgal ba dang lan skabs brgyud pa med pa nyid de /
translated: therefore, the great bodhisattvas, how is this speech of deprecation?

original: gzhan gyi don nyid du chos zab mo rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa'i rab tu @64a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don nyid du chos zab mo rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa'i rab tu @64a * //
translated: For the sake of others, the profound Dharma is to be realized, and the literal meaning is to be refuted, and the literal meaning is an obscuration for practice.

original: rtogs pa dgag par bya ba'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa spyod pa ni sgrib pa yin no zhes 'phags pa byams pas gsungs pas so //
analyzed: rtogs pa dgag par bya ba'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa spyod pa ni sgrib pa yin no zhes 'phags pa byams pas gsungs pas so //
translated: This is stated by the noble Maitreya.

original: de'i lan sbyin par bya ba la sogs pa'i don du yang de'i ngag dang rgyal ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i lan sbyin par bya ba la sogs pa'i don du yang de'i ngag dang rgyal ba la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: And in order to give an answer, etc., he teaches the Victor, etc.,

original: gang dang gang blo dman pa'i the tshom gi gnas de spang bar bya'o zhes rigs pa las so //
analyzed: gang dang gang blo dman pa'i the tshom gi gnas de spang bar bya'o zhes rigs pa las so //
translated: because it is logical to eliminate whatever is a source of doubt for those of lesser intelligence.

original: gang theg pa gzhan du ngan song gi rgyu yin pa de 'dir ma rig pa'i lhan cig byed pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyur yang dag pa'i ye shes la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /
analyzed: gang theg pa gzhan du ngan song gi rgyu yin pa de 'dir ma rig pa'i lhan cig byed pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyur yang dag pa'i ye shes la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /
translated: And it is amazing that what is a cause of the lower realms in another vehicle is a cause of Buddhahood here, because it is free from ignorance as a co-originator, and is a co-originator of correct wisdom, etc.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa las gzhan gyis 'di sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir rmad du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa las gzhan gyis 'di sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir rmad du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is marvelous because no one other than an Omniscient One has seen this before.

original: tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes pa ni blo gros dman pas rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes pa ni blo gros dman pas rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The words spoken badly are because of the attachment to contradiction with one's own words by those of inferior intellect.

original: de nas zhes pa ni gang kho bo cag gis brtsad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs pa'i phyir gnas pa nyid do zhes de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni gang kho bo cag gis brtsad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs pa'i phyir gnas pa nyid do zhes de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then is because of the non-abandonment of the conceptualization of the dispute by those who think, We are still here!

original: des par zhes pa ni gang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod pa de rigs pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: des par zhes pa ni gang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod pa de rigs pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: The words certainly are because of the fact that what they say is the nature of reasoning.

original: des na 'di ltar brjod ma thag pa'i skur ba 'debs pa ma brjod cig //
analyzed: des na 'di ltar brjod ma thag pa'i skur ba 'debs pa ma brjod cig //
translated: Therefore, do not say, Do not speak thus, as was just said.

original: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /
translated: Why is it not reasonable?

original: gsungs pa 'di zhes te mngon sum mo //
analyzed: gsungs pa 'di zhes te mngon sum mo //
translated: It is said this which is direct perception.

original: gang rnams kyi zhe na ;
analyzed: gang rnams kyi zhe na ;
translated: Whose?

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The Buddhas, the Omniscient Ones.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: snying po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ste de'i ye shes can gyi tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ste de'i ye shes can gyi tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence is that of the dharmadhatu, because it is established by the valid cognition of the wisdom of that.

original: de'i phyir na de rnams nyid kyi mngon sum mo //
analyzed: de'i phyir na de rnams nyid kyi mngon sum mo //
translated: Therefore, it is the direct perception of those.

original: de zhes pa ni gzhan gyi lkog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni gzhan gyi lkog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The that is the hidden of others.

original: chos nyid ces pa ni gang ngan song gi rgyu ma rig pa'i lhan cig byed pa can /
analyzed: chos nyid ces pa ni gang ngan song gi rgyu ma rig pa'i lhan cig byed pa can /
translated: The dharmata is that which is the cause of the lower realms, accompanied by ignorance.

original: de nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thabs la mkhas pa'i lhan cig byed pa zhes te /
analyzed: de nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thabs la mkhas pa'i lhan cig byed pa zhes te /
translated: That itself is the path of unsurpassed enlightenment, accompanied by skill in means.

original: khyad par can gyi tshogs pa nges pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi tshogs pa nges pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid do //
translated: The definition of the special assembly is the dharmata of dependent origination.

original: gang gsungs pa mi mkhas pa //
analyzed: gang gsungs pa mi mkhas pa //
translated: As it is said:

original: sdig pa chung du byas kyang 'og tu 'gro ;
analyzed: sdig pa chung du byas kyang 'og tu 'gro ;
translated: The unwise go below even by committing a small misdeed.

original: / mkhas pa sdig chen byas kyang don med spong //
analyzed: / mkhas pa sdig chen byas kyang don med spong //
translated: The wise abandon even a great misdeed for no reason.

original: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang 'og tu 'gro //
analyzed: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang 'og tu 'gro //
translated: Even a small lump of iron goes below.

original: de nyid snod du byas na steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid snod du byas na steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur //
translated: If it is made into a vessel, it will float above.

original: dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang // de lta bu'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang // de lta bu'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa yang ngo //
translated: Purity is natural luminosity, and the attainment of such a result.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it so?

original: snying po yang yin la /
analyzed: snying po yang yin la /
translated: It is the essence,

original: chos kyang yin te @64b thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyang yin te @64b thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and also the Dharma, the dharmadhatu without beginning or end.

original: de nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi don yin pa des na gnyis su med pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi rnam pas bsgom par bya ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi don yin pa des na gnyis su med pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi rnam pas bsgom par bya ba las byung ba'o //
translated: That itself is the meaning of supramundane wisdom, which arises from meditation through the aspect of non-dual wisdom and means.

original: des na dag pa yin te de'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na dag pa yin te de'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is pure because it is concordant with that.

original: gang gi phyir 'di byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: Because this is the conduct of enlightenment,

original: gnas ni yon tan ma lus pa'i tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ni yon tan ma lus pa'i tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
translated: the abode is the support for the accumulation of all good qualities.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
translated: For those endowed with great means,

original: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
analyzed: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
translated: Afflictions become branches of enlightenment.

original: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid de //
translated: Samsara has the nature of peace,

original: de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas /
analyzed: de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas /
translated: Therefore, the Tathagata is inconceivable.

original: de nas zhes te gal te theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa yang mthong ba'i chos la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yin la de'i tshe de la skur pa btab na yang ji ltar 'jigs pa la sogs pa tsam yang mi skye
analyzed: de nas zhes te gal te theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa yang mthong ba'i chos la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yin la de'i tshe de la skur pa btab na yang ji ltar 'jigs pa la sogs pa tsam yang mi skye
translated: At that time, even if one denigrates it, how could fear, etc. arise?

original: zhes gdul dka' ba'i gdul bya'i dgos pa rtogs pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: zhes gdul dka' ba'i gdul bya'i dgos pa rtogs pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: This is for the purpose of the difficult to tame disciples.

original: 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang brgyal bar gyur pa ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i 'jigs pa bstan pa'i don du yin te /
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang brgyal bar gyur pa ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i 'jigs pa bstan pa'i don du yin te /
translated: Fear, terror, and fainting are taught for the purpose of the small, medium, and great fears.

original: de yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang theg pa chen po la skur pa btab pas mthong ba'i chos la yang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed de /
analyzed: de yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang theg pa chen po la skur pa btab pas mthong ba'i chos la yang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed de /
translated: Moreover, even a great bodhisattva who denigrates the Mahayana obtains an undesired result in this life.

original: gzhan rnams la shin tu yang yin pas 'di la rmi lam yang skur ba 'debs pa de dgag par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la shin tu yang yin pas 'di la rmi lam yang skur ba 'debs pa de dgag par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: Since it is also very much so for others, this is for the purpose of stopping even dreaming of denigration.

original: 'di nas zhes pa ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snying rje yod na de'i tshe cis de blang bar bya ba'i don du 'bad par mi byed ces de ltar rtog pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: 'di nas zhes pa ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snying rje yod na de'i tshe cis de blang bar bya ba'i don du 'bad par mi byed ces de ltar rtog pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: “Here” means that, if all the Tathagatas have compassion, then why do they not strive to take up that compassion?

original: brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas zhes pa ni snying rje sad pa'i rgyu gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas zhes pa ni snying rje sad pa'i rgyu gsungs pa'o //
translated: “Seeing them faint” is the statement of the cause of the arousal of compassion.

original: de nas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rtogs par bya ba nyid kyis chos kyi mi rtog pa nyid kyi zab mo bstan par bya ba'i don du cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnas te /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rtogs par bya ba nyid kyis chos kyi mi rtog pa nyid kyi zab mo bstan par bya ba'i don du cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnas te /
translated: “Then” means that the Lord remained silent, intending to teach the profundity of the nonconceptuality of the Dharma by way of his own realization through direct intuition that is his own special domain.

original: gal te bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ston par byed pa de rtogs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu yod na ji ltar na de nyid kyis slong bar mi byed ces dpyod pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: gal te bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ston par byed pa de rtogs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu yod na ji ltar na de nyid kyis slong bar mi byed ces dpyod pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: “If the Lord teaches the Mahayana, and if he has the power of concentration through his realization, then why does he not arouse them?”

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rdo rje gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rdo rje gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi that is the vajra which is the nature of wisdom and means, which is nondual and equal to space, is also called that.

original: 'od ni zla ba zhu ba ste nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer gyis so //
analyzed: 'od ni zla ba zhu ba ste nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer gyis so //
translated: Light is the melting of the moon, by the light rays of the sun and moon.

original: de ma thag pa dang tsam zhes smos pas bar mchod pa dang 'bad pa med par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ma thag pa dang tsam zhes smos pas bar mchod pa dang 'bad pa med par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is said to be “immediate” and “just,” it is said to be without interruption and without effort.

original: sems @65a * //
analyzed: sems @65a * //
translated: The mind is the moon, which is the nature of the mind of enlightenment.

original: can gyi don mthong bas dgyes te rangs pa'i bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: can gyi don mthong bas dgyes te rangs pa'i bzhad pa'o //
translated: The laughter of delight is the delight of seeing the benefit of sentient beings.

original: chos thob pa'i mthu gsal bar byed pa'i gsung bsgrags so //
analyzed: chos thob pa'i mthu gsal bar byed pa'i gsung bsgrags so //
translated: The proclamation of speech is the manifestation of the power of attaining the Dharma.

original: chos zhes pa ni lung ngo //
analyzed: chos zhes pa ni lung ngo //
translated: The Dharma is the scriptures.

original: yang chos ni rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i ngo bo ste dge 'dun no //
analyzed: yang chos ni rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i ngo bo ste dge 'dun no //
translated: Moreover, the Dharma is the nature of the maṇḍala of realization, which is the Saṅgha.

original: chos kyi don de brjod par bya ba'i lam ting nge 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi don de brjod par bya ba'i lam ting nge 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The meaning of the Dharma is the path of expression, which is the characteristic of the three samādhis, and so on.

original: de las byung ba ni gang gi dkyil 'khor ba'i bdag po yin la 'di ni sangs rgyas yin te dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gang gi dkyil 'khor ba'i bdag po yin la 'di ni sangs rgyas yin te dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: The one who arises from that is the lord of the mandala, and this is the Buddha, the homage to the Three Jewels.

original: chos rnams kyi dag pa ni tshad mas grub pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi dag pa ni tshad mas grub pa'o //
translated: The purity of phenomena is established by valid cognition.

original: don ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: don ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The meaning is the pristine awareness of the intrinsic purity of reality.

original: de'i ngo bo ni bdag med pa ste dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni bdag med pa ste dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Its essence is selflessness, the absence of entities.

original: de nyid rdo rje dbyer med pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje dbyer med pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: That itself is the vajra, the indivisible wisdom.

original: de thams cad zil gyis mnan pas na rgyal po ste mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de thams cad zil gyis mnan pas na rgyal po ste mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Since it overwhelms everything, it is the king, Akṣobhya.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag pas na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral bas dag pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag pas na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral bas dag pa'o //
translated: Since it is the perfect body, speech, and mind, it is pure, free from the afflictive and cognitive obstructions along with their traces.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is equal to space.

original: de bzhin nyid la de nyid gang gi gnas yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la de nyid gang gi gnas yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That suchness is the abode of that is called “suchness.”

original: de nyid kyi phyir dus thams cad du de bzhin du gyur pa mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dus thams cad du de bzhin du gyur pa mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is always thus, and so it is unchanging.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang ba dang bral bas snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang ba dang bral bas snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is free from the appearance of subject and object, and so it is non-appearing.

original: rdo rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The vajra body is Vairocana.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gsum gyi lam der byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gsum gyi lam der byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The one who has arisen on the path of the three times, past, future, and present, is the Tathagata.

original: de rnams kyi thugs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
translated: Their mind is the great vajra holder.

original: de nyid dbyings su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid dbyings su gyur pa ste /
translated: That itself is the realm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems nyid las skye'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems nyid las skye'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas are born from the mind of enlightenment itself.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos kun du son pas nam mkha' chen po'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos kun du son pas nam mkha' chen po'o //
translated: It is the great space, because it pervades the nature of the dharmadhatu, which is without beginning or end.

original: de bzhin du lam yang de nyid yin te de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lam yang de nyid yin te de skad ces bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the path is also that, and so it is called that.

original: nam mkha' ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin te de'i bdag nyid sku las byung ba ni rin chen tog go //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin te de'i bdag nyid sku las byung ba ni rin chen tog go //
translated: Space is the wisdom of equality, and the one who has arisen from the body that is of the nature of that is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: brjod bya rjod byed dang bral ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod byed dang bral ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is equal to space, free from the expressed and the expresser.🔽

original: gsung ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gsung ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The speech is the nature of the twelve branches of the scriptures.

original: skyes bu mchog gi don rab tu byed pas ston par byed pa yin te 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu mchog gi don rab tu byed pas ston par byed pa yin te 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: It is the teacher, since it is the best of men, and it is Amitabha.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i thugs te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i ngo bo gang gis yin pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i thugs te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i ngo bo gang gis yin pa'o //
translated: The mind is like space, since it is the nature of the door of liberation which is natural luminosity.

original: chos ni stobs la sogs pas te @65b gang mchog yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: chos ni stobs la sogs pas te @65b gang mchog yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Dharma is the powers, etc.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba nan tan gyis 'grub par gyur pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba nan tan gyis 'grub par gyur pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct is the practice of the welfare of all beings.

original: gnas ni rten te don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ni rten te don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The abode is the support, which is Amoghasiddhi.

original: 'di ni dkon mchog gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo la phyag 'tshal ba bzhis shin tu brjod pa'i phyir lan gnyis su brjod pas tshad ma bzhi ston pas dag pa'i yon tan mngon par gsal pa'i sgo nas ston pa pos bstod pa yin no
analyzed: 'di ni dkon mchog gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo la phyag 'tshal ba bzhis shin tu brjod pa'i phyir lan gnyis su brjod pas tshad ma bzhi ston pas dag pa'i yon tan mngon par gsal pa'i sgo nas ston pa pos bstod pa yin no
translated: This is the praise by the teacher, who shows the four authorities by repeating twice, because he expresses very well the homage to the nature of the six Tathagatas, the three jewels, by four salutations.

original: // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i thabs kyi rnams pa la 'jug pa brjod ma thag pa yin no //
analyzed: // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i thabs kyi rnams pa la 'jug pa brjod ma thag pa yin no //
translated: The method of entering the aspects of the means of purifying all the aspects of the conduct of the practice of all mundane and supramundane powers has just been explained.

original: de ni brjod pa thams cad de gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: de ni brjod pa thams cad de gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: That is the supreme of all statements because it is the chief.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u lnga pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter of the Sri-Guhyasamaja-alamkara.

original: // / de nas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni /
translated: Then.

original: rdo rje 'dzin thugs dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin thugs dpal dang ldan //
translated: Vajradhara, glorious in mind,

original: zhes pa la sogs pas thugs byin gyis brlab pa byas pa la thugs rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor pa rnams tha dad do zhes blo gros dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rje sla'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas thugs byin gyis brlab pa byas pa la thugs rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor pa rnams tha dad do zhes blo gros dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rje sla'o //
translated: The meaning of the verse beginning the vajra of mind is this: The vajra of mind, the Tathagatas, and the yogins are different—this is the conception of those of inferior intellect.

original: 'dis ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra gnyis kyi yang don bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sgra gnyis kyi yang don bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the refutation of that.

original: sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba rnams ni 'dir sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams yin te /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba rnams ni 'dir sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams yin te /
translated: The secret of body, etc. , are the vajras of body, etc.

original: de rnams nyid rdo rje gang gi yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams nyid rdo rje gang gi yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is of those is so-called.

original: de ltar yang 'dir ni thugs gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang 'dir ni thugs gtso bo yin no //
translated: Thus, here, mind is primary.

original: thugs ni thugs rdo rje ste byin gyis brlab par byed pas tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs par byed pa bsal nas gang gis de bstan par byed pa de gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thugs ni thugs rdo rje ste byin gyis brlab par byed pas tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs par byed pa bsal nas gang gis de bstan par byed pa de gsungs pa'o //
translated: The mind is the vajra of mind, and the consecration is done by it. Having removed the superimposition of difference, he states that by which it is taught.

original: aom yig gi don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: aom yig gi don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the syllable OM has been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyang ste /
translated: and all the Tathagatas and the mind vajras,

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa bdag gi yin pa de la aa ham zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa bdag gi yin pa de la aa ham zhes bya'o //
translated: the nature of all of them is the nature of the Element of the Dharma, and that nature is mine, the nature of the yogin.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo //
translated: Thus it is with the others as well.

original: bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma'i rdul rnams te gang sku rdo rje las so //
analyzed: bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma'i rdul rnams te gang sku rdo rje las so //
translated: The stains of passion, etc. are the impurities.

original: de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis chos ma lus pa'i gzugs brnyan bskyed pa rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gnas so //🔽de nyid rdo rje gang du de @66a * //
analyzed: de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis chos ma lus pa'i gzugs brnyan bskyed pa rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gnas so // de nyid rdo rje gang du de @66a * //
translated: That itself is the abode, since it is the nature of the mirror-like intuition, the basis for the perfect accomplishment of one's own and others' goals, by generating the reflections of all things.

original: yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That itself is the vajra, and that is just so.

original: sku ni sku rdo rje'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: sku ni sku rdo rje'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The body is the vajra body.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: The sameness of all the Tathagatas is thusness, and it is nondual by its very nature.

original: gsung ni 'dir gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gsung ni 'dir gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: Speech is here Vajra Speech.

original: rdo rje gsum ni 'dir thugs dang sku dang gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni 'dir thugs dang sku dang gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: The three vajras are here Vajra Mind, Vajra Body, and Vajra Speech.

original: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret of the nature of the Dharma Body, etc.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten yin pas gnas so //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten yin pas gnas so //
translated: The place is the place of the support of all perfections.

original: snying ga dang mgo bo dang lkog ma rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma'i bdag nyid ni gnas yin te /
analyzed: snying ga dang mgo bo dang lkog ma rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma'i bdag nyid ni gnas yin te /
translated: The place is the nature of the vajra, wheel, and lotus located on the moon at the heart, head, and throat.

original: 'di'i rten gyi gnas la de kho na nyid gsum sa bon gyi gzugs kyis rnam par bsgom pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rten gyi gnas la de kho na nyid gsum sa bon gyi gzugs kyis rnam par bsgom pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the place of support, where one should visualize the three realities in the form of seed syllables.

original: tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas bsgrubs te brten par byas nas brjod ma thag pa'i sngags gsum po 'di rnams kyis so //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs pa bsal bas bsgrubs te brten par byas nas brjod ma thag pa'i sngags gsum po 'di rnams kyis so //
translated: Having established and supported the refutation of the superimposition of difference, one should do this with the three just-mentioned mantras.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i phyir mchog rab bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i phyir mchog rab bo //
translated: It is the supreme of all worldly and transcendent mantras, because it causes the attainment of the supreme result.

original: bco brgyad pa las /🔽dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi //
analyzed: bco brgyad pa las / dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi //
translated: The Eighteenth Chapter🔽The mind that arises

original: rkyen gyis gang dang gang 'byung yid //
analyzed: rkyen gyis gang dang gang 'byung yid //
translated: through the conditions of the sense faculties and objects

original: yid de man zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: yid de man zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: is explained as the manas.

original: tra ni skyob par byed pas so //
analyzed: tra ni skyob par byed pas so //
translated: The tra is because it protects.

original: zhes sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is endowed with the characteristics of a mantra.

original: de nas zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu /
translated: Then,

analyzed: de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes par bya /
translated: he should please the Sugata.

analyzed: zhes te / shes rab dang thabs kyi so so'i rdul phra rab la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba chen po'i rjes su chags par zhugs pa la rnal 'byor pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su chags pa don dam par

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin te de rnams yin no //
translated: all the Tathagatas are also that, and they are those.
