translated: Since any knowledge consort of any family is taught to be a yogic practice, that yoga should be done with her, and she should be worshipped just as the Sugata is worshipped.

original: 'dis ni zhes pa ni brjod ma thag pas tshe 'di nyid la zhes pa ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nor bu dang sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la sogs pa'i mthu srid par rjes su dpag pa dang lung yang gzhan du yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes pa ni brjod ma thag pas tshe 'di nyid la zhes pa ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nor bu dang sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la sogs pa'i mthu srid par rjes su dpag pa dang lung yang gzhan du yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is said because of the absence of any valid cognition that could contradict it, and because it is inconceivable to one who is not omniscient. The possibility of the power of special jewels, spells, medicines, and meditative absorptions, etc., is inferred from other sources, and scripture is also the same.

original: mthong ba med pa tsam yang tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: mthong ba med pa tsam yang tshad ma ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that the mere absence of perception is not a valid cognition.

original: tshogs pa ma tshang ba'i phyir yang thams cad du thams cad kyis thams cad grub pa ma mthong ste dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ngag gi slob dpon dang slob ma ngag dang nyams su len pa rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa ma tshang ba'i phyir yang thams cad du thams cad kyis thams cad grub pa ma mthong ste dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ngag gi slob dpon dang slob ma ngag dang nyams su len pa rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, because of the incompleteness of the assemblage, one does not see that everything is accomplished everywhere by everyone, because it is difficult to find a teacher and a disciple of speech who have the characteristics described in the glorious Web of Magical Illusion Tantra, and speech and practice.

original: 'jug pa'i yan lag nyid yin te mkhas pa de dag don la the tshom yod kyang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yan lag nyid yin te mkhas pa de dag don la the tshom yod kyang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no zhes pa'i rigs pas so //

translated: Thus, by any one of the downfalls of the fourteen root downfalls, there is a defeat.

analyzed: ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, like the top of a palm tree being cut off, there is no generation of the roots of virtue.🔽As for the commitments of the five families, the Vajrashekhara Tantra teaches:

original: bla ma ji ltar 'byor mchod byas //
analyzed: bla ma ji ltar 'byor mchod byas //
translated: Having made offerings to the guru as much as possible,

original: dkyil 'khor de las byang chub sems ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de las byang chub sems ;
translated: and having generated the spirit of enlightenment in the mandala of that,

original: / bskyed dang gsum la skyabs 'gro sogs //
analyzed: / bskyed dang gsum la skyabs 'gro sogs //
translated: and having gone for refuge in the three,

original: sdom pa blang bar bya zhes brjod //
analyzed: sdom pa blang bar bya zhes brjod //
translated: one should take the vows.

original: de phyir bcos pa dka' ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de phyir bcos pa dka' ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of that, it is difficult to restore,

original: thams cad kyi dngos grub ma mthong ba rigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dngos grub ma mthong ba rigs pa nyid do //
translated: and it is reasonable that all accomplishments are not seen.

original: de bzhin du yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las gsang ba'i bdag po de rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /🔽ji ltar theg pa chen po la mngon par yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngags kyi spyod pa'i theg pa mngon sum du byed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo spangs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan
analyzed: de bzhin du yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las gsang ba'i bdag po de rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste / ji ltar theg pa chen po la mngon par yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngags kyi spyod pa'i theg pa mngon sum du byed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo spangs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan
translated: “Guhyapati, by this enumeration, it should be known thus:

original: pa med do //
analyzed: pa med do //
translated: Just as for the bodhisattvas who are fully engaged in the Mahāyāna, the vehicle of mantra practice is the direct means for attaining the door of liberation, without which they would not be able to attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is that?

original: gang bskal pa du mas byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyor zhing stsol ba dang sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar byed pa /
analyzed: gang bskal pa du mas byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyor zhing stsol ba dang sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar byed pa /
translated: Because those who, over many eons, apply themselves as bodhisattvas and abandon suffering

original: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: will not fully awaken to enlightenment.

original: de'i skye ba 'di nyid la sngags kyi theg pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i skye ba 'di nyid la sngags kyi theg pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: In this very lifetime, the bodhisattvas who practice the mantra vehicle will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gsang ba'i bdag po skye ba 'di nyid la zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'di rnams la ming bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ming de dang po nyid du log ste chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir ro
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po skye ba 'di nyid la zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'di rnams la ming bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ming de dang po nyid du log ste chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir ro
translated: O Lord of Secrets, in this very lifetime means that since the Thus-Gone One has given them names, those bodhisattvas first reverse from those names and attain the meditative absorption of realizing the nature of all phenomena.

original: // sku dang gsung dang thugs grub pas gang gzhan dman pa'i 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang rnal 'byor skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: // sku dang gsung dang thugs grub pas gang gzhan dman pa'i 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang rnal 'byor skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Since they have accomplished the body, speech, and mind, other inferior mundane and supramundane yogas will arise.

original: dngos grub lhag ma de rnams thams cad nyid kyang bshad ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor pa la 'bad pa med pa nyid du grub ste mngon du 'gyur ba ni sku la sogs pa yang dag par 'grub par gyur pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis te bstan pa pos zhes
analyzed: dngos grub lhag ma de rnams thams cad nyid kyang bshad ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor pa la 'bad pa med pa nyid du grub ste mngon du 'gyur ba ni sku la sogs pa yang dag par 'grub par gyur pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis te bstan pa pos zhes
translated: All those remaining powers are also accomplished without effort for the yogī just explained, manifest, by that very cause of the perfect accomplishment of the body and so forth.🔽The teacher says this.

original: gsungs so // bzlas pas zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum po dbye ba med par bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: gsungs so // bzlas pas zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum po dbye ba med par bsgoms pas so //
translated: “By recitation” means by meditating on the three vajras as undifferentiated.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bdun pa'o /🔽// / de nas zhes pa ni lo bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa rig pa'i brtul @74a * //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bdun pa'o / // / de nas zhes pa ni lo bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa rig pa'i brtul @74a * //
translated: This concludes the seventh chapter of the Ornament of the Guhyasamāja.🔽Then, “after that” means that the Bhagavān taught in this tantra the reliance on a knowledge consort who is suitable for the conduct of awareness, such as a sixteen-year-old girl, and that this is prohibited in other vehicles.

original: zhugs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i rig ma bsten pa rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la theg pa gzhan du yang bkag pa yin te de ji ltar bkag pa gal te de nyid kyis bsgrubs na de'i tshe 'gal ba yin la gal te thabs la mkhas pa'i
analyzed: zhugs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i rig ma bsten pa rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la theg pa gzhan du yang bkag pa yin te de ji ltar bkag pa gal te de nyid kyis bsgrubs na de'i tshe 'gal ba yin la gal te thabs la mkhas pa'i
translated: If that is accomplished by that, then it is contradictory.

original: khyad par gyis de'i tshe yul tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med pa yin na 'on kyang de brjod par gyis shig / yang gang gi tshe rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ma byin
analyzed: khyad par gyis de'i tshe yul tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med pa yin na 'on kyang de brjod par gyis shig / yang gang gi tshe rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ma byin
translated: In particular, since the object is different at that time, there is no contradiction.

original: pa las tshogs yongs su rdzogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: pa las tshogs yongs su rdzogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: But when the yogi/nī is always in meditative equipoise, then how does the accumulation become complete without giving the seven precious articles, etc.?🔽This is the thought of the disciples.

original: nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas mchod pa'i rin po che thams cad 'grub pas rin chen tog gis gsol ba btab pa gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas mchod pa'i rin po che thams cad 'grub pas rin chen tog gis gsol ba btab pa gsungs so //
translated: The request of Ratnaketu is stated, because all precious offerings are accomplished by meditating on the wisdom that is equal to space.

original: 'bras bu chen por gyur pa dang lam du yang 'gyur ba'i theg pa gang gis yin pa de nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i spyod pas sems can gyi khams sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu chen por gyur pa dang lam du yang 'gyur ba'i theg pa gang gis yin pa de nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i spyod pas sems can gyi khams sbyong bar byed pa yin no //
translated: That very vehicle which becomes the great result and also the path purifies the realm of sentient beings by the conduct that is equal to space.

original: mchod pa'i mchog ni gsang ba dang gzhan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i mchog ni gsang ba dang gzhan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The supreme worship is the secret and whatever else there is, that is called that.

original: mchod pa ni phyi dang gzhan te gsungs shig pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni phyi dang gzhan te gsungs shig pa'o //
translated: Worship is external and other, it is said.

original: ma lus pa'i sdig pa'i chos rnams las rgyal bas na rgyal mchog po //
analyzed: ma lus pa'i sdig pa'i chos rnams las rgyal bas na rgyal mchog po //
translated: The supreme victor is because of victory over all evil dharmas.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che ni sngar bshad pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che ni sngar bshad pa'o ;
translated: Great passion, hatred, and folly are as explained above.

original: / rdo rje theg pa 'dir sems can rnams 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje theg pa 'dir sems can rnams 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
translated: In this Vajra Vehicle, they cause sentient beings to enter.

original: nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa ni gzhal du med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa ni gzhal du med pa'i phyir la /
translated: Equal to the space element is because of being immeasurable.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog go //
translated: And for that very reason, it is supreme.🔽The path of liberation is the nondual gnosis of the stream of great bliss, which has the nature of wisdom and method.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi bde ba chen po'i rgyun gyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni thar pa ste de'i lam ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi bde ba chen po'i rgyun gyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni thar pa ste de'i lam ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the path of that, which has the nature of the three samadhis.

original: de kho na nyid kyis ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyis ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the teacher of reality itself.

original: gdul bya'i rab tu snang ba la ltos nas byang chub pa gsum ni theg pa gsum ste /
analyzed: gdul bya'i rab tu snang ba la ltos nas byang chub pa gsum ni theg pa gsum ste /
translated: The three enlightenments in relation to the appearance of the disciples are the three vehicles.

original: de'i lam la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lam la 'jug pa'o //
translated: One enters their paths.

original: gsung gcig nyid du gsungs mod kyi //
analyzed: gsung gcig nyid du gsungs mod kyi //
translated: Although the Buddha taught in one voice,

original: du ma nyid du so sor rig //
analyzed: du ma nyid du so sor rig //
translated: the disciples understood it in many ways.

original: ces pa'i rigs pas so ;
analyzed: ces pa'i rigs pas so ;
translated: This is the reasoning.

original: / theg pa gsum po de'i mtshan nyid kyang ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: / theg pa gsum po de'i mtshan nyid kyang ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the characteristics of those three vehicles?🔽The vehicle of the disciples is for those who value their own purpose.🔽For their sake, the Buddha taught the vehicle of the disciples.

original: gang du gzhan don gtso bo yin //
analyzed: gang du gzhan don gtso bo yin //
translated: The vehicle of the solitary realizers is for those who value the purpose of others.🔽For their sake, the Buddha taught the vehicle of the solitary realizers.

original: de yi don du rang don brjod //
analyzed: de yi don du rang don brjod //
translated: The vehicle of the bodhisattva is for those who value the purpose of others above their own.

original: sangs rgyas kyis rig theg pa che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis rig theg pa che //
translated: For their sake, the Buddha taught the Great Vehicle.

original: de las theg gnyis gzhan du yin //
analyzed: de las theg gnyis gzhan du yin //
translated: The vehicle of the disciples and the vehicle of the solitary realizers are taught as separate from that Great Vehicle.

original: ci yi phyir de yin zhe na //
analyzed: ci yi phyir de yin zhe na //
translated: Why are they taught as separate?

original: bdag tu mthong ba bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag tu mthong ba bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reverse the view of a self.

original: thog mtha' med pa'i @74b sems grub phyir //
analyzed: thog mtha' med pa'i @74b sems grub phyir //
translated: In order to establish the mind as beginningless and endless,

original: nyan thos theg sogs dman dang bar //
analyzed: nyan thos theg sogs dman dang bar //
translated: the vehicle of the disciples and so on are taught for the inferior.

original: shes rab ldan pa'i dbang du byas //
analyzed: shes rab ldan pa'i dbang du byas //
translated: The Great Vehicle is taught for the wise.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase “and so on” includes the vehicle of the solitary realizers.

original: theg pa chen po yang gnyis te //
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang gnyis te //
translated: The Great Vehicle is also twofold:

original: rgyu yi theg pa chen po ni //
analyzed: rgyu yi theg pa chen po ni //
translated: the causal Great Vehicle

original: 'di ltar blo gros dman pa'i sems //
analyzed: 'di ltar blo gros dman pa'i sems //
translated: Thus, the mind of those of lesser intelligence

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral ba ;
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral ba ;
translated: Is free from the duality of subject and object.

original: / pha rol phyin pa'i lugs su brjod //
analyzed: / pha rol phyin pa'i lugs su brjod //
translated: This is called the system of the perfections.

original: dri ma ma lus dag don du //
analyzed: dri ma ma lus dag don du //
translated: For the sake of purifying all stains without exception,

original: 'bras bu'i theg pa chen po ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i theg pa chen po ni //
translated: The result vehicle of the Great Vehicle

original: ji ltar snod ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: ji ltar snod ni ma lus pa //
translated: Is like a vessel for all.

original: 'gro don ma lus bsgrub ched du //
analyzed: 'gro don ma lus bsgrub ched du //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing all the aims of beings,

original: sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni //
translated: Through various emanated forms,

original: des ni sngags theg thub pa'i'o //
analyzed: des ni sngags theg thub pa'i'o //
translated: The vehicle of the mantra is the vehicle of the Sage.

original: gang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
translated: In the noble Lankavatara-sutra,

original: zab mo'i theg pas 'jigs rnams la /
analyzed: zab mo'i theg pas 'jigs rnams la /
translated: For those afraid of the profound vehicle,

original: sngon po la sogs don gsungs yin //🔽gzung med 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yi //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs don gsungs yin // gzung med 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yi //
translated: The meaning of blue and so forth is taught.

original: rnam shes bar ma'i blo can la //
analyzed: rnam shes bar ma'i blo can la //
translated: For those with an intermediate understanding of consciousness,🔽Which lacks the apprehended object but has the aspect of the apprehender,

original: kha cig gnyis dang nges bral ba //
analyzed: kha cig gnyis dang nges bral ba //
translated: Some are free from both.

original: zab mo'i don la 'jigs spangs la //
analyzed: zab mo'i don la 'jigs spangs la //
translated: Abandoning fear of the profound meaning,

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskal pa mchog ni srid pa'i mtha' yang dag par grub pa gang gi ngag pa'i bdag nyid gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskal pa mchog ni srid pa'i mtha' yang dag par grub pa gang gi ngag pa'i bdag nyid gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The supreme eon of the buddhas is the limit of existence, which is the nature of the body of attributes.

original: yangs pa ni spyan lnga gang gi yin pa'o //
analyzed: yangs pa ni spyan lnga gang gi yin pa'o //
translated: It is vast because it has the five eyes.

original: chos ni stobs la sogs pa rnams te /🔽dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
analyzed: chos ni stobs la sogs pa rnams te / dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
translated: The Dharma is the powers and so on.🔽It is a wheel because it is a circle.

original: gdul bya'i rgyud la 'pho ba'i phyir na 'khor lo ste de bskor ba'o //
analyzed: gdul bya'i rgyud la 'pho ba'i phyir na 'khor lo ste de bskor ba'o //
translated: It is turned because it is transferred to the mindstreams of disciples.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag par dag pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral bas dag pa ste dri ma med pa gang yin pa de la skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag par dag pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral bas dag pa ste dri ma med pa gang yin pa de la skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is pure because it is free from the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience together with their propensities.

original: 'di dag thams cad ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are all of these called “supreme”?

original: gang gi phyir tshad ma dang lung gis mi gnod pa'i phyir 'di rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa nyid kyis lam dang 'bras bu'i theg pa de la phyag 'tshal ba khyod la yod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshad ma dang lung gis mi gnod pa'i phyir 'di rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa nyid kyis lam dang 'bras bu'i theg pa de la phyag 'tshal ba khyod la yod pa'o //
translated: Since it is not invalidated by valid cognition or scripture, it is like a diamond, indivisible.

original: rigs thams cad la gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad la gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king of all the families, because it is the principal one.🔽It is space, because it is the wisdom that is of the same taste as suchness, like space, and it pervades everything.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du de bzhin nyid kyi ro gcig pa'i ye shes des thams cad du son pas kyang nam mkha' ste gang gi phyir mi 'gyur bas na rtag pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du de bzhin nyid kyi ro gcig pa'i ye shes des thams cad du son pas kyang nam mkha' ste gang gi phyir mi 'gyur bas na rtag pa'o //
translated: It is permanent, because it is unchanging.

original: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
translated: Thus, because of its vast activity,

original: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
translated: it is said to be the pervasive buddha.

original: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: And because of its inexhaustibility,

original: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
translated: it is also said to be permanent.

original: zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las so //🔽thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rang @75a * //
analyzed: zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las so // thams cad dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rang @75a * //
translated: This is from the Ornament of Clear Realization.🔽The consecration of all is the nature of the jewel family.

original: bzhin no // kun gyi don ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ngo bos kun gyi don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhin no // kun gyi don ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ngo bos kun gyi don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the meaning of all, because it is the essence of the sky treasury, which is the meaning of all.

original: khams gsum thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal po thob pas kun gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal po thob pas kun gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: He is the lord of all because he has attained the sovereignty of Dharma over all the three worlds.

original: dbyer mi phyed pa zag pa med pa'i dga' ba rgyas pa 'dzin par byed pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer mi phyed pa zag pa med pa'i dga' ba rgyas pa 'dzin par byed pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the holder of the vajra jewel because he holds the indivisible, undefiled, expanded joy.

original: mchod pa ni gsang ba yin la de kho na nyid ni mchod pas chen po'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni gsang ba yin la de kho na nyid ni mchod pas chen po'o //
translated: Worship is the secret, and reality is the great worship.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the reality of the Tathagatas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang las rgyal ba rnams 'byung ba gang yin pa de la skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang las rgyal ba rnams 'byung ba gang yin pa de la skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is the source of the victors.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni bskal pa bzang po ste de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni bskal pa bzang po ste de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Because the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas are the good eon, it is their fruit.

original: gang gi phyir sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams la dbyer med pas de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams la dbyer med pas de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: Because the body vajra and so forth are indivisible, they are truly established by the nature of reality, which is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar zhe na /

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis //
translated: Likewise, with all external smells and so forth,

original: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing //🔽tha dad rnam par rtog las nges grol bya //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing // tha dad rnam par rtog las nges grol bya //
translated: the lords of the victors are well worshipped,

original: zhes so // dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
analyzed: zhes so // dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
translated: and one should be liberated from the conceptualization of difference.

original: zhes pas ni dpag tu med pa'i tshad tsam du bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshon pa'i don du 'di yin no //
analyzed: zhes pas ni dpag tu med pa'i tshad tsam du bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshon pa'i don du 'di yin no //
translated: The meaning of this is to illustrate the mandala of meditation that is the measure of immeasurability,🔽as it is said:🔽The measure of a hundred leagues.

original: gang 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: What is to be explained is:

original: dpag med bye ba brgyar yangs pa //
analyzed: dpag med bye ba brgyar yangs pa //
translated: Immeasurable, vast for a hundred million.

original: zhes so ; /'khor los mtshon pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi yin te de bzhin du padma dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang rin po ches mtshon pa yang yin te /
analyzed: zhes so ; /'khor los mtshon pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi yin te de bzhin du padma dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang rin po ches mtshon pa yang yin te /
translated: The illustration of the wheel is that of Vairocana, and likewise, the illustrations of the lotus, vajra, sword, and jewel are also that of Akṣobhya and so forth.🔽The word utpala is also a metaphor for the jewel.

original: autpala'i sgras kyang rin po che nyid de brdar byas pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams yin no //🔽autpalas mtshon pa'i phyir gzhan gyis dkyil @77a * //
analyzed: autpala'i sgras kyang rin po che nyid de brdar byas pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams yin no // autpalas mtshon pa'i phyir gzhan gyis dkyil @77a * //
translated: Since it is a metaphor, Akṣobhya and so forth are illustrated by the utpala.

original: 'khor yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the mandala should be meditated on by others.

original: rigs rnams zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
analyzed: rigs rnams zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
translated: The families are the mandala deities.

original: gru bzhi ni mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gru bzhi ni mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is square because it is without any unevenness.

original: shin tu mdzes pa ni rin po che ma lus pas spras pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mdzes pa ni rin po che ma lus pas spras pa'o //
translated: It is very beautiful because it is adorned with all the jewels.

original: mchod rten ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: mchod rten ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The stupa is the celestial mansion.

original: gsal ba ni shel bzhin du phyi ngos na gnas pas kyang nang na yod pa'i don mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba ni shel bzhin du phyi ngos na gnas pas kyang nang na yod pa'i don mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is clear because the meaning that is within it is seen by means of the external aspect, like a crystal.

original: rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is naturally stainless because it is the nature of the dharmadhatu.

original: bu mo lo bcu gnyis lon pa dga' ba rgyas par byed pa'i phyir rin chen yin la zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po de la brten par gyur pas de nyid kyi phyir na mchog go //
analyzed: bu mo lo bcu gnyis lon pa dga' ba rgyas par byed pa'i phyir rin chen yin la zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po de la brten par gyur pas de nyid kyi phyir na mchog go //
translated: The girl who is twelve years old is a jewel because she causes the expansion of joy, and because she becomes the basis of that uncontaminated great bliss, it is supreme.

original: rin po che thams cad ni rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi yin te bdun ni bud med dang glang po che dang / rta dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang khyim bdag dang / dmag dpon rin po che rnams so //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad ni rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi yin te bdun ni bud med dang glang po che dang / rta dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang khyim bdag dang / dmag dpon rin po che rnams so //
translated: All the jewels are of all the deities of the clan. The seven are the jewel of the woman, the jewel of the elephant, the jewel of the horse, the jewel of the wheel, the jewel of the householder, and the jewel of the general.

original: nyi ma so sor thun mtshams bzhi ru'o //
analyzed: nyi ma so sor thun mtshams bzhi ru'o //
translated: [The jewels] are to be given every day in the four periods.

original: shes rab can ni mchod pa la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab can ni mchod pa la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa yin te /
translated: The wise one is the one who is unmistaken about the worship, etc.

original: sbyin pa'i don ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi don du'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i don ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi don du'o //
translated: The meaning of the giving is for the sake of the meaning of the Ākāśagarbha meditative stabilization.

original: rang 'od kyi rig ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus su yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: rang 'od kyi rig ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus su yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: At the time of union with the knowledge woman of one’s own light, having performed the yoga of one’s own deity, the lord of the maṇḍala,

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa'i bde ba chen po reg pa'i sbyor bas rdul phra rab kyi nang du //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa'i bde ba chen po reg pa'i sbyor bas rdul phra rab kyi nang du //
translated: by the yoga of touching the stainless great bliss of the nature of wisdom and method, in the middle of the atoms of the body of the knowledge woman,🔽one should generate the maṇḍala of the deity.🔽It is said,

original: de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes //
analyzed: de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes //
translated: “By that, the Sugata is pleased.”

original: sngags pas dga' ba kun du brtsam par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags pas dga' ba kun du brtsam par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: The mantrin should undertake all the joys.

original: bdag po'i phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag po'i phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The lord's seal, etc.

original: gang gsungs pa //
analyzed: gang gsungs pa //
translated: As it is said:

original: bde bas ngal zhing skyo bar 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: bde bas ngal zhing skyo bar 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: By the bliss of the seal, one becomes weary and tired.

original: gang gis de skyes bde dam rgyal ba la //
analyzed: gang gis de skyes bde dam rgyal ba la //
translated: By whom that is produced, the supreme bliss of the Victor,

original: phul bas myur du de ni 'grub yin te //
analyzed: phul bas myur du de ni 'grub yin te //
translated: is offered, that is quickly accomplished.

original: nges pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: nges pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: It is certain that it will be attained.

original: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The array maṇḍala is the collected maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su gnas te rang gi gzugs ni rang gi lha ste //
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas te rang gi gzugs ni rang gi lha ste //
translated: Dwelling in its center, one's own form is one's own deity,

original: dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid so so'i rdul phra rab de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid so so'i rdul phra rab de las byung ba'o //
translated: in the maṇḍala, arisen from the individual atoms of the nature of the Tathāgatas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir kun gyis mchod par bya ba yin pas bla ma ste bdud rtsi lngas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir kun gyis mchod par bya ba yin pas bla ma ste bdud rtsi lngas so //
translated: For that very reason, it is the guru, to be worshipped by all, with the five nectars.

original: bla ma yang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: bla ma yang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that the guru should also be worshipped in this way.

original: rig pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas pas lha'i bu mo rnams kyis de kho na nyid kyis mchod par bya'o zhes @77b gsungs pa //
analyzed: rig pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas pas lha'i bu mo rnams kyis de kho na nyid kyis mchod par bya'o zhes @77b gsungs pa //
translated: One who abides in the conduct of knowledge should be worshipped by the celestial maidens with reality.

original: btsun mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas ni sngar brjod zin to //
analyzed: btsun mo zhes pa la sogs pa ste byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas ni sngar brjod zin to //
translated: The queen and so on are the places of consecration, which have been mentioned previously.

original: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The worship of reality is the worship of one's deity.

original: blang zhes pa ni padma la gnas pa rang gi khas blang ba'o //
analyzed: blang zhes pa ni padma la gnas pa rang gi khas blang ba'o //
translated: The accept is the acceptance by one's mouth of the one who is in the lotus.

original: dbyer med pa'i sku la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i sku la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de'i mchod pa'o //
translated: It is the worship of that one because it perfects the body and so on of non-differentiation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa //
translated: For that very reason it is said:

original: sngags ni grub pa'i phyir brjod pa //
analyzed: sngags ni grub pa'i phyir brjod pa //
translated: The mantra is uttered for the sake of accomplishment.

original: ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of the one who has the vajra of intuition.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhes so //
translated: The Tathagatas and so on.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u brgyad pa'o /
translated: The eighth chapter of the Sri-Guhyasamaja-alamkara.

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la lnga par bsrung ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa de ji ltar bsrung bar bya ba yin /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes bya ba la lnga par bsrung ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa de ji ltar bsrung bar bya ba yin /
translated: Then, the vow of protection was taught in the fifth chapter. How is it to be protected?

original: gzhan yang de thun mong pa'i yul yin nam //
analyzed: gzhan yang de thun mong pa'i yul yin nam //
translated: Moreover, is it the domain of the common man?

original: khyad par can spyod yul yin zhes gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su shes pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: khyad par can spyod yul yin zhes gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su shes pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: The special is the domain of the yoginis, after the complete understanding of the concepts of the disciples.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang du yin pa nyid kyi phyir de rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang du yin pa nyid kyi phyir de rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the indivisible vajra of the three vajras of body, speech, and mind.

original: rigs brgya'i rnam par dbye ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: rigs brgya'i rnam par dbye ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is the nature of the classification of the hundred families.

original: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: It is delightful because it is the nature of great bliss.

original: theg pa gzhan gyi rnal 'byor pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: theg pa gzhan gyi rnal 'byor pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is not the domain of the yogins of other vehicles.

original: de ltar na gang rnams kyi yul yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na gang rnams kyi yul yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, Whose domain is it?

original: gsungs pa / 'dir sangs rgyas dang ye shes can rnams kyi ste theg pa 'di'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'dir sangs rgyas dang ye shes can rnams kyi ste theg pa 'di'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yin no //
translated: it is said that it is the domain of the buddhas and yogins of this vehicle.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas 'di ston pa yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa la sogs pas 'di ston pa yin te /
translated: This is taught by the realm of space, and so on.

original: 'di ltar sna tshogs pa rnam pa mang po 'chad par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin te khyad par can gyi yul yang yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sna tshogs pa rnam pa mang po 'chad par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin te khyad par can gyi yul yang yin no //
translated: Thus, this [mantra] should be protected by the various many methods that will be explained, and it is also a special object.🔽For those who are faithless, who speak ill of sentient beings,

original: ma dad pa'i smra sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // gdug pa'i sems can rnams la yang //
analyzed: ma dad pa'i smra sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // gdug pa'i sems can rnams la yang //
translated: and for those who are evil sentient beings,

original: rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o //
translated: this invocation should be done.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcu gsum par bshad pa'i cho gas 'di la blo gros mi mthun par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcu gsum par bshad pa'i cho gas 'di la blo gros mi mthun par mi bya'o //
translated: By this and so forth, one should not disagree with this [mantra] through the rite explained in the thirteenth [chapter].

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'dir ni dgos pa 'di yin gnyug ma yin //
analyzed: 'dir ni dgos pa 'di yin gnyug ma yin //
translated: Here, this is the purpose, not the original [purpose].

original: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bdag nyid bsam byas nas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bdag nyid bsam byas nas //
translated: Having visualized oneself in the center of the maṇḍala,

original: mi bskyod phyag tu h'um skyes rdo rje ni //
analyzed: mi bskyod phyag tu h'um skyes rdo rje ni //
translated: the vajra born from the syllable hūṃ in Akṣobhya's hand,

original: rnam par bsams nas gsod par byed pa yin //
analyzed: rnam par bsams nas gsod par byed pa yin //
translated: having visualized that, one should kill.

original: 'di ltar yang ni sems ni grub pa ste //🔽rdo rje grub pa @78a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang ni sems ni grub pa ste // rdo rje grub pa @78a * //
translated: In this way, the mind is accomplished,

original: nyid du yang dag 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: nyid du yang dag 'gyur ba yin //
translated: and one becomes truly accomplished🔽as the vajra itself.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba gsang ba de yis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba gsang ba de yis ni //
translated: By that secret blazing vajra,

original: bla ma bslu la sogs pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: bla ma bslu la sogs pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: And those sentient beings who deceive their gurus and so on,

original: phyi rol gnyug ma'i rig mas byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: phyi rol gnyug ma'i rig mas byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: Are blessed by the innate wisdom consort of the outer

original: bud med padma'i nang du rlung dang me yin ni //
analyzed: bud med padma'i nang du rlung dang me yin ni //
translated: The wind and fire are in the lotus of the woman,

original: 'khor lo la gnas 'di ru gnas pa rnams ;
analyzed: 'khor lo la gnas 'di ru gnas pa rnams ;
translated: Residing here in the cakra.

original: / de la snying rje'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: / de la snying rje'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi who is compassionate

original: stong pa nyid ces chos rnams bsam byas la //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ces chos rnams bsam byas la //
translated: Should contemplate the emptiness of phenomena,

original: brtan pa nyid du bdag po'i nga rgyal byas /
analyzed: brtan pa nyid du bdag po'i nga rgyal byas /
translated: And generate the pride of being the lord.

original: khro bo'i ngag gis gnyug ma'i sngags su ming /
analyzed: khro bo'i ngag gis gnyug ma'i sngags su ming /
translated: With an angry voice, the innate mantra

original: bcug pa gsal por brjod pas brdeg par bya //
analyzed: bcug pa gsal por brjod pas brdeg par bya //
translated: Should be recited clearly and struck.

original: de bzhin du yang 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa las gzhan du thams cad kyi thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa las slar ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa las gzhan du thams cad kyi thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa las slar ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, here the bodhisattva turns away from all killing in every way, except for sentient beings who harm the Three Jewels.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa la skul bar byed do zhes sbyong yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las so //
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa la skul bar byed do zhes sbyong yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las so //
translated: Moreover, one should exhort others to turn away from killing, as the Sūtra of the Pure Domain of Practice says.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de sngon du song ba'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de sngon du song ba'i rjes la'o //
translated: The Buddha Vairocana is the one who precedes them.

original: phyag na zhes pa ni g-yas na'o //
analyzed: phyag na zhes pa ni g-yas na'o //
translated: In the hand means in the right hand.

original: sangs rgyas rnams zhes pa ni gal te dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa yin na de'i tshe de rnams kyang ste shin tu yang 'di bsgom pa'i stobs kyis yin par brjod pa'i don du'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams zhes pa ni gal te dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa yin na de'i tshe de rnams kyang ste shin tu yang 'di bsgom pa'i stobs kyis yin par brjod pa'i don du'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: The Buddhas, if they are the ones who are harming the Three Jewels, then they also, and very much so, are said to be the power of meditation on this, according to some.

original: sangs rgyas rnams bsgoms nas ldang ba rnams rdo rjes phye mar bya'o zhes kha bskangs nas 'brel to zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams bsgoms nas ldang ba rnams rdo rjes phye mar bya'o zhes kha bskangs nas 'brel to zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: The Buddhas, having meditated, the ones who rise up are to be pulverized with the vajra, according to others, who add to the text.

original: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na gnas pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na gnas pas so //
translated: With such a secret vajra means with the blazing vajra in the hand.

original: sems can thams cad ces pa ni ngan song gi las kyi lam la sogs pa la zhugs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa thabs du mas lam ngan pa las bzlog par mi nus pas thabs gzhan med pas so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces pa ni ngan song gi las kyi lam la sogs pa la zhugs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa thabs du mas lam ngan pa las bzlog par mi nus pas thabs gzhan med pas so //
translated: All sentient beings means those engaged in the paths of action of the lower realms, who cannot be turned away from the bad paths by many means such as the four means of gathering disciples, because there is no other means.

original: thams cad kyi sgra ni 'dir rnam pa ma lus nyid la 'jug par bzung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgra ni 'dir rnam pa ma lus nyid la 'jug par bzung ngo //
translated: The word all here is taken to refer to the totality of aspects.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid longs spyod pa'i phyir longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid longs spyod pa'i phyir longs spyod pa'o //
translated: Since the body, speech, and mind are enjoyed, they are enjoyment.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams med par gyur pa ni rdo rjes phye mar byas pas gnyis su med par de bzhin nyid kyi ror gcig tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang sems can rnams med par gyur pa ni rdo rjes phye mar byas pas gnyis su med par de bzhin nyid kyi ror gcig tu byas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of buddhas and sentient beings is the nonduality of the vajra pulverization, which is made into one taste in the flavor of suchness.

original: der de bzhin du gyur pas ci zhig bya zhe na gsungs pa bsam gtan mchog ni bsgom @78b par bya'o //
analyzed: der de bzhin du gyur pas ci zhig bya zhe na gsungs pa bsam gtan mchog ni bsgom @78b par bya'o //
translated: What is done by becoming such? It is said: The supreme meditation should be cultivated.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed ba dag thugs rdo rje'i rnam par grub pa thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed ba dag thugs rdo rje'i rnam par grub pa thob par byed pa'o //
translated: The object of attainment and the means of attainment are made into the attainment of the accomplishment of the form of the mind vajra.

original: de bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: de bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na //
translated: What happens by meditating on that?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / mi bskyod rdo rje'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras su shes rab dang thabs bde ba chen po gcig tu mthar thug par bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsungs pa / mi bskyod rdo rje'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras su shes rab dang thabs bde ba chen po gcig tu mthar thug par bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the buddha-field of Akshobhya, the sons of the Victor are born in a single ultimate of the great bliss of wisdom and method, to be accomplished and to accomplish.

original: sgrub pa po sa 'di ltar bsgoms pa'i mthus 'gyur na bsgrub bya rnams ji ltar 'gyur te des ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub pa po sa 'di ltar bsgoms pa'i mthus 'gyur na bsgrub bya rnams ji ltar 'gyur te des ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it happens by the power of the practitioner meditating in this way, what about those to be accomplished, since they do not meditate?

original: ting 'dzin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //🔽ji ltar gzhan gyi rgyud dag las //
analyzed: ting 'dzin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis // ji ltar gzhan gyi rgyud dag las //
translated: By the union of concentration and mantra,🔽just as poisons and so forth are removed

original: dug sogs sel ba de bzhin du //
analyzed: dug sogs sel ba de bzhin du //
translated: from the continuums of others,

original: bde ba'i rnam pas srid pa yin //
analyzed: bde ba'i rnam pas srid pa yin //
translated: so too is existence by the aspect of bliss.

original: sgrub dang gnod byed med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrub dang gnod byed med pa'i phyir //
translated: Since there is no accomplishment or harm,

original: 'dir ni mkhas pa'i the tshom yin //
analyzed: 'dir ni mkhas pa'i the tshom yin //
translated: this is the doubt of the wise.

original: snying rje sgro 'dogs bral sbyor ba //
analyzed: snying rje sgro 'dogs bral sbyor ba //
translated: Compassion is the union free from superimposition,

original: don la brten las gzhan ma yin //
analyzed: don la brten las gzhan ma yin //
translated: not other than the basis of the meaning.🔽Since there is no doubt about the meaning, it is engaged,

original: don la the tshom med phyir 'jug / des na mkhas rnams rigs pa yin ;
analyzed: don la the tshom med phyir 'jug / des na mkhas rnams rigs pa yin ;
translated: and thus it is reasonable for the wise.

original: / rang don la nges de rnams la //
analyzed: / rang don la nges de rnams la //
translated: And in their own interest,

original: rjes su dpag pa bzung ba yin //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa bzung ba yin //
translated: They are to be understood as inferences.

original: gang gis rnam par bsgoms gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gis rnam par bsgoms gyur pa //
translated: Those who have cultivated them

original: sems ni de 'bras blo gsal yin //
analyzed: sems ni de 'bras blo gsal yin //
translated: Have minds clear about the results of those.

original: bsgom pa'i yongs su mthar thug pa //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i yongs su mthar thug pa //
translated: The culmination of cultivation

original: zhes sogs sngar ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: zhes sogs sngar ni brjod pa yin //
translated: Has been explained above.

original: de yi don ni 'di yin te //
analyzed: de yi don ni 'di yin te //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis las de las bzlog par mi nus pas thabs gzhan med par blta ste /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis las de las bzlog par mi nus pas thabs gzhan med par blta ste /
translated: Even if the Three Jewels are harmed, since it is not possible to turn them away from that action by means of the four ways of gathering disciples, one should see that there is no other method.

original: snying rje chen po bskyed la bde bar gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba btab ste de rnams las bka' dang so so'i bka' thob pas de'i nyon mongs pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i khro ba bcos ma rnams nye bar bstan te /
analyzed: snying rje chen po bskyed la bde bar gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba btab ste de rnams las bka' dang so so'i bka' thob pas de'i nyon mongs pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i khro ba bcos ma rnams nye bar bstan te /
translated: One should generate great compassion, make supplications to the sugatas, and through receiving their permission and their individual permissions, one should display the simulated anger of great compassion toward their afflictions.

original: mi bskyod pa dang gzhan gang yang rung bas thun bzhi ru ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas thun par ma la bla ma'i gdams ngag las nang dang phyi'i bdag nyid kyi kha sbyor ba yang dag par phye zhing bral bar byas te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dang gzhan gang yang rung bas thun bzhi ru ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas thun par ma la bla ma'i gdams ngag las nang dang phyi'i bdag nyid kyi kha sbyor ba yang dag par phye zhing bral bar byas te /
translated: One should meditate on the form of Akṣobhya or any other deity, endowed with the three meditative stabilizations, in four sessions, in accordance with the guru’s instructions, having thoroughly opened and separated the inner and outer aspects of union.🔽All the deities are free from protection, abiding in the center of wind and fire, with naked bodies smeared with ghee, and with loose hair, without a refuge.

original: lha thams cad dang bsrung ba dang bral ba rlung dang me'i dkyil na gnas pa mar nag gis byugs pa'i lus gcer bu skra grol ba skyabs med pa la g-yas na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa rnams bsal🔽te gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ro @79a * //
analyzed: lha thams cad dang bsrung ba dang bral ba rlung dang me'i dkyil na gnas pa mar nag gis byugs pa'i lus gcer bu skra grol ba skyabs med pa la g-yas na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa rnams bsal te gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ro @79a * //
translated: The blazing vajra, which is on the right, removes all faults of passion, etc.,🔽and one should meditate on the object of attainment as the taste of nondual suchness,

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub bya bsgoms te /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub bya bsgoms te /
translated: which is not the nature of the foundation consciousness.

original: yi ge h'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gzugs la mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gzugs la mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa //
translated: One should bless the eyes, body, etc., of the form of Akṣobhya, etc., accomplished from the syllable hūṃ, etc.

original: badzr'i ka ces pa la sogs pas phyung ste /
analyzed: badzr'i ka ces pa la sogs pas phyung ste /
translated: With vajra āḥ and so on, he is extracted.

original: mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs par khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i stan la yang dag par bzhag ste /
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs par khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i stan la yang dag par bzhag ste /
translated: He is placed upon the throne of the Dharma King of the three realms in the world realm Abhirati and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He is consecrated and blessed by the empowerment of the Dharma King of the three realms by the Tathāgatas and so on.

original: de ltar 'dis yang dag par sbyangs pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gzugs can de'i zhing la sogs par rgyal ba'i sras por 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'dis yang dag par sbyangs pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gzugs can de'i zhing la sogs par rgyal ba'i sras por 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by his purification, he becomes a Bodhisattva in the realm of Akṣobhya and so on.

original: thams cad du yang drag po'i las thams cad la 'di ltar blta bar bya'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: thams cad du yang drag po'i las thams cad la 'di ltar blta bar bya'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: In all cases, one should view him in this way in all fierce rites, say some.

original: 'di yang brjod ma thag pa'i thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i khyad par gyis sems can ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag par thob par byed pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'di yang brjod ma thag pa'i thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i khyad par gyis sems can ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag par thob par byed pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dam tshig go //
translated: This is also a pledge because it is not to be transgressed, since it causes all sentient beings to attain the authentic, unsurpassed enlightenment by the special skill in the above-mentioned great means.

original: gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhe sdang gtso bor gyur pa'i rigs la'o //
analyzed: gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhe sdang gtso bor gyur pa'i rigs la'o //
translated: It is a pledge of the family of wrath, which is dominated by anger.

original: de yang rigs thams cad nyid yon tan rin po che ma lus pa'i rten du gyur pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho ste der yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rigs thams cad nyid yon tan rin po che ma lus pa'i rten du gyur pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho ste der yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: And that is also an ocean, since it is the basis of all the jewels of good qualities, etc. of all the families, and so forth.

original: las thams cad ni rigs thams cad la grub pas so //
analyzed: las thams cad ni rigs thams cad la grub pas so //
translated: All activities are accomplished by all the families.

original: 'di tsam yang sems can srog chags gsod pa rnams zhes pa'i mdo'i don gyi 'grel pa yin la slar yang rgyud phyi ma las ;
analyzed: 'di tsam yang sems can srog chags gsod pa rnams zhes pa'i mdo'i don gyi 'grel pa yin la slar yang rgyud phyi ma las ;
translated: This much is a commentary on the meaning of the sutra, “Even those who kill living beings, etc.”, and it should be seen as a commentary by the Tantra of the Subsequent Tantra,

original: zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed par bya //
analyzed: zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed par bya //
translated: “One should generate the wheel of wrath.”

original: zhes pa la sogs pas 'grel par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas 'grel par blta bar bya'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: bye ba la sogs pa yod pa'i phyug po ser snas mnar ba'i sems can rnams yod de de'i nor ye she kyis phrogs te yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sras po rnams ni thar pa'i don du rab tu bsgrubs pas ye shes thar
analyzed: bye ba la sogs pa yod pa'i phyug po ser snas mnar ba'i sems can rnams yod de de'i nor ye she kyis phrogs te yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sras po rnams ni thar pa'i don du rab tu bsgrubs pas ye shes thar
translated: There are beings who are rich with many millions, but are tormented by the stinginess of their minds. Their wealth is stolen by the wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, and they are established in liberation for the sake of the attainment of Buddhahood, which is like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of the Bodhisattvas is established in liberation.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur ba'i dri ma bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin te /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur ba'i dri ma bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin te /
translated: They are pure by nature, because they are free from the stains of adventitious conceptual thoughts about things that are their own and others.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, they are unstained, like space.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub @79b par byed pa'i de kho na nyid bzhon par gyur pa'i phyir de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub @79b par byed pa'i de kho na nyid bzhon par gyur pa'i phyir de kho na nyid do //
translated: They are reality, because they are the vehicle for the reality of the object to be attained and the means of attainment.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of the vajra body.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa ni dkyil 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa ni dkyil 'khor ba'o //
translated: All buddhas refers to the maṇḍala residents.

original: ma ra ga ta la sogs pa'i rin po che dbrog par bya ba thams cad la phul du byung ba'i sbyor ba shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa des so //
analyzed: ma ra ga ta la sogs pa'i rin po che dbrog par bya ba thams cad la phul du byung ba'i sbyor ba shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa des so //
translated: By that union of wisdom and means, which is the most excellent practice, one should imagine all the jewels, such as the marakata, to be taken away.

original: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs su rab tu brtag go //
analyzed: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs su rab tu brtag go //
translated: One should imagine the vajra as the form of the Tathagatas.

original: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spros te gzhan gyi nor bu phung po la bcug ste margad la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gyur par bsgom mo //
analyzed: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spros te gzhan gyi nor bu phung po la bcug ste margad la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gyur par bsgom mo //
translated: Having emanated the Tathagatas from one's pores, one should imagine them to enter the mass of jewels of others and to transform into emeralds, etc.

original: bstan ma thag pa'i nor thams cad kyi so so'i rdul phra rab rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid rnams so //
analyzed: bstan ma thag pa'i nor thams cad kyi so so'i rdul phra rab rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid rnams so //
translated: One should imagine all the jewels just mentioned to be the nature of the eternal maṇḍala of atoms of each.

original: rdo rje gsum gyis zhes pa la sems can thams cad dang khyad par du yang ser sna can rnams thams cad yi dags kyi 'gro ba las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mngon du byas la chos thams cad ni gdong nas ma skyes pa'o zhes
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyis zhes pa la sems can thams cad dang khyad par du yang ser sna can rnams thams cad yi dags kyi 'gro ba las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mngon du byas la chos thams cad ni gdong nas ma skyes pa'o zhes
translated: With the three vajras means that one should arouse great compassion in order to turn away all sentient beings, and especially the miserly, from the destiny of hungry ghosts, and think All phenomena are primordially unborn.

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dmigs te sku las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis dgug pa dang / tshig gis aom a'a: dzi na dzi ka che gi mo'i nor bu gcig dza h'um zhes brjod pa dang sems kyis dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la nye bar mkho bar bsams la dbrog cing dgug go //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dmigs te sku las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis dgug pa dang / tshig gis aom a'a: dzi na dzi ka che gi mo'i nor bu gcig dza h'um zhes brjod pa dang sems kyis dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la nye bar mkho bar bsams la dbrog cing dgug go //
translated: One should visualize the complete purity of the three spheres, and with light rays emanating from one's body, one should summon with the words Oṃ āḥ jina jik che gi mo's jewel one ja hūṃ, and with the mind one should imagine that one is taking away and summoning the necessities of the Three Jewels and so forth.

original: sbyin pa'i char ni dgug pa yis //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i char ni dgug pa yis //
translated: By summoning the rain of generosity,

original: gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis //
analyzed: gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis //
translated: all those with the wheel of delusion

original: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and so forth, one should meditate on what is taught in the Later Tantra.

original: thabs la mkhas pa 'dis nor gyi bdag po yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa 'dis nor gyi bdag po yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur te ;
translated: By this skill in means, the master of wealth becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem,

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas yin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas yin te /
translated: because he fulfills all the wishes of all sentient beings, because he is inconceivable to those who are not omniscient, and because he is dependent-arising.

original: rnal 'byor pa snying rje chen po'i dbang du song ba dang ldan pas bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa snying rje chen po'i dbang du song ba dang ldan pas bya'o //
translated: This should be done by the yogi who is governed by great compassion.

original: gang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las theg pa gzhan gyi sems can ser sna dang ldan pa ma gtogs par 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyis thams cad la rnam par thams cad du ma byin par len pa las slar ldog🔽par 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan yang ma @80a * //
analyzed: gang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las theg pa gzhan gyi sems can ser sna dang ldan pa ma gtogs par 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyis thams cad la rnam par thams cad du ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par 'gyur ro // gzhan yang ma @80a * //
translated: In the Enlightenment of Vairocana, it says that the great bodhisattva here turns away from taking what is not given, except for those sentient beings of other vehicles who are stingy.

original: byin par len pa las ldog pa la sbyor bar byed do zhes so //
analyzed: byin par len pa las ldog pa la sbyor bar byed do zhes so //
translated: He also causes others to turn away from taking what is not given.

original: gzhan gyi nor la mngon dga' ba //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor la mngon dga' ba //
translated: and delight in the wealth of others.

original: zhes pa'i mdo'i don bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa'i mdo'i don bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse of the scripture.

original: padma dmar po dang rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig gsum po yang 'od dpag tu med pa'i yin no //
analyzed: padma dmar po dang rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig gsum po yang 'od dpag tu med pa'i yin no //
translated: The three words “red lotus,” “jewel,” and “mandala” are of Amitābha.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis so //
translated: “The Buddhas” means the members of the mandala.

original: thams cad ni dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: thams cad ni dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: “Everything” means the mandala.

original: bud med lta bur sbyin pa ni thams cad ces pa ste thams cad nyid rang 'od kyi rig ma dang ldan par bsgoms la de rnams kyang rim gyis 'phrog ste rang gi rig pa'i nang du gzhug pa sngon du song ba'i nga rgyal gyis so //
analyzed: bud med lta bur sbyin pa ni thams cad ces pa ste thams cad nyid rang 'od kyi rig ma dang ldan par bsgoms la de rnams kyang rim gyis 'phrog ste rang gi rig pa'i nang du gzhug pa sngon du song ba'i nga rgyal gyis so //
translated: “Giving like a woman” means that one should visualize oneself as having everything, that is, as being endowed with one’s own light and consort, and then, having gradually taken them away, one should imagine that one has introduced them into one’s own consort.

original: ji ltar padma dmar po la //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po la //
translated: Just as a red lotus

original: tshon gyi skyon gyis mi gos ltar //🔽gnas skyon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: tshon gyi skyon gyis mi gos ltar // gnas skyon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
translated: is not soiled by stains,

original: de bzhin rnam dag khams gsum po //
analyzed: de bzhin rnam dag khams gsum po //
translated: so the pure three realms🔽are not soiled by various faults.

original: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don la mos par bya ste gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas longs spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don la mos par bya ste gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas longs spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should be intent on the meaning of this verse, and enjoy with the yoga of nonduality.

original: phyi rol la yang de la phan pa'i don du de bzhin du nye bar longs spyod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol la yang de la phan pa'i don du de bzhin du nye bar longs spyod par bya'o //
translated: Also, externally, one should enjoy in the same way for the sake of benefiting them.

original: stobs kyis dgug pa'am gzhan dbang du byas pas sam sems las spros te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de rnams rang 'od kyi shes rab la bstims pas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs kyis dgug pa'am gzhan dbang du byas pas sam sems las spros te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de rnams rang 'od kyi shes rab la bstims pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should summon by force, or by subjugating others, or by emanating from one's mind, and make offerings to the tathāgatas by dissolving them into one's own light-wisdom.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the two organs,

original: de rnams thams cad nyer spyad de //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad nyer spyad de //
translated: one should enjoy all of them.

original: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the four commitments,

original: zhes te // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: zhes te // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
translated: all tathāgatas

original: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //🔽phyag rgya dam tshig tu brjod de //
analyzed: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas // phyag rgya dam tshig tu brjod de //
translated: do not pass beyond.🔽The seal is called the commitment.

original: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa yis //
analyzed: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa yis //
translated: The firm mental form

original: zhes dpal mchog dang po las so //
analyzed: zhes dpal mchog dang po las so //
