analyzed: zhes brjod pas so //
translated: As it is said,

original: gang 'phags pa byams pas /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa byams pas /
translated: The noble Maitreya says,

original: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
analyzed: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
translated: One does not abide in existence through knowledge,🔽and one does not abide in peace through compassion,

original: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang // des na nyes pa mthong phyir srid par min //
analyzed: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang // des na nyes pa mthong phyir srid par min //
translated: and so one does not abide in existence because one sees the faults,

original: snying rjer ldan phyir myang 'das min //
analyzed: snying rjer ldan phyir myang 'das min //
translated: and one does not abide in nirvana because one has compassion.

original: gzhan don skye bar mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan don skye bar mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: One sees the birth for the sake of others,

original: srid pa brtan par gnas pa'ang yin //
analyzed: srid pa brtan par gnas pa'ang yin //
translated: and so one abides firmly in existence.

original: gang dag gis yang shes rab dang thabs la zhu bar gyur pa sku gsung thugs mnyes par 'chad de //
analyzed: gang dag gis yang shes rab dang thabs la zhu bar gyur pa sku gsung thugs mnyes par 'chad de //
translated: Those who are skilled in wisdom and method explain the delighting of body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams ni //
analyzed: de rnams ni //
translated: They are

original: ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya //
translated: to be done by the one who has the vajra of wisdom.

original: zhes pa 'dis 'di'i don brjod pa'i phyir zlos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis 'di'i don brjod pa'i phyir zlos pa'o //
translated: This is a repetition in order to express the meaning of this.

original: rdo rje gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The three vajras, etc. is the essence.

original: aom zhes pa la sogs pas ni so sor gsum gyi gzugs so //
analyzed: aom zhes pa la sogs pas ni so sor gsum gyi gzugs so //
translated: With Om, etc. is the form of each of the three.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pas ni bzlas pa'i dus kyi rten yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pas ni bzlas pa'i dus kyi rten yin no //
translated: The vajra mandala, etc. is the support at the time of repetition.

original: aom ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog / ces pa la sogs pas ni spros pa sngon du song ba'i sdud pa'o zhes kha bskang ba dang ldan pas dngos su zhugs pa'i sdud pa la sogs pa'o zhes brjod do ;
analyzed: aom ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog / ces pa la sogs pas ni spros pa sngon du song ba'i sdud pa'o zhes kha bskang ba dang ldan pas dngos su zhugs pa'i sdud pa la sogs pa'o zhes brjod do ;
translated: Om is the supreme body of the Buddha, etc. is the gathering of the emanations that have gone forth, and is the actual entry into the gathering, etc.

original: /'di ni snying rje dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ho gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa yi ge gsum po brjod ma thag ma'i rigs pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid bla na med pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: /'di ni snying rje dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ho gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa yi ge gsum po brjod ma thag ma'i rigs pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid bla na med pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the three syllables that are contained in the middle of the two HOHs, which are the nature of compassion and wisdom. By the reasoning just expressed, they accomplish the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, which is the nature of non-abiding nirvana.

original: ye shes rdo rje ste ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos so //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ste ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos so //
translated: The great vajra-holder, who is the vajra of pristine consciousness, that is, the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ni gang 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyis 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ni gang 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyis 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //
translated: The cause of the buddhas is that which produces the result of buddhahood.

original: 'di rnams ni aom yig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu rnams te sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni aom yig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu rnams te sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: These are the buddhas' beings, such as the syllable om, and so on, which are the nature of Vajra Body and so on.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽rdzogs pa la sogs pa gang rnams kyis byin gyis @90a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / rdzogs pa la sogs pa gang rnams kyis byin gyis @90a * //
translated: How so?🔽 The perfections and so on are the infinite blessings and so on that are not to be transcended.

original: rlob pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gang rnams kyi dam tshig de rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i dam tshig bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rlob pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gang rnams kyi dam tshig de rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i dam tshig bsgom pa'o //
translated: The pledge of those is the meditation on the pledge of the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge of all the tathagatas is their body, speech, and mind.🔽 🔽Pledge means to take up, to hold, and to possess.

original: de'i de kho na nyid ni ye shes te dga' ba yin la de nyid kun du bzang por nges pa ste de nyid rdo rje yin zhing de nyid byin gyis rlob pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid ni ye shes te dga' ba yin la de nyid kun du bzang por nges pa ste de nyid rdo rje yin zhing de nyid byin gyis rlob pa yin te /
translated: Its reality is exalted wisdom, which is joy, and that itself is ascertained as Samantabhadra, which is the vajra, which is the consecration.🔽

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgrub par nus pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgrub par nus pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Its reality is intuition, which is joy, and that itself is ascertained as Samantabhadra, which is the vajra, which is the consecration, which is the cause of the ability to achieve the body, speech, and mind of a Buddha.

original: dben pa rnams su zhes pa ni rigs mi mthun pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: dben pa rnams su zhes pa ni rigs mi mthun pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa rnams su'o //
translated: In solitary places means in places free from the discordant side of samadhi, which is discordant with the spiritual levels.

original: nyams dga' ba rnams su zhes pa ni yid du 'ong ba rnams su'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba rnams su zhes pa ni yid du 'ong ba rnams su'o //
translated: In delightful places means in pleasant places.

original: yang zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi khyad par sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi khyad par sdud pa'o //
translated: Again means that it includes the special places that will be explained.

original: 'di ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the achievement of the common spiritual powers that will be explained.

original: zla ba phyed kyis zhes pa ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa dang mtshan ma thob pa dang lha rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas snod dang ldan pa babs pas lha rnams bris pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor du gnas te yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas sgrub par
analyzed: zla ba phyed kyis zhes pa ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa dang mtshan ma thob pa dang lha rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas snod dang ldan pa babs pas lha rnams bris pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor du gnas te yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas sgrub par
translated: The half month is the time for one who is a fit vessel, who has practiced the rite of knowledge, who has obtained the signs, and who has been authorized by the gods, to enter into the performance of the rite, having entered the mandala of the image of the gods, and having all the requisites.

original: rtsom pa la zhugs pas so //
analyzed: rtsom pa la zhugs pas so //
translated: He begins the rite.

original: sgrub thabs gsungs pa nam mkha' rdo rje ni chos kyi 'byung gnas te thams cad du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub thabs gsungs pa nam mkha' rdo rje ni chos kyi 'byung gnas te thams cad du shes par bya'o //
translated: The sky-vajra is the source of phenomena, and should be understood as everywhere.

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The clear mandala is here the mandala of Vairochana.

original: rang gi sngags dang dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad yin la de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi sngags dang dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad yin la de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba ste /
translated: One's own mantra and pledge are Vairochana, and in his heart, in the heart of the awareness-being, is the moon.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba la gnas nas yi ge aom las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po rnams phyogs bcur spros te snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchog bsgom pas de'i rnam pa ru
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba la gnas nas yi ge aom las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po rnams phyogs bcur spros te snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchog bsgom pas de'i rnam pa ru
translated: and from the syllable oṃ in the center of the wheel, a great mass of light rays in the aspect of the five transcendent lords is emanated into the ten directions, and all sentient beings are visualized as Vairocana according to their respective vessels.

original: bsgrubs te bsdus zhugs te brtan par gyur pas rjes su mnyes par byed pa rnams ni yang dag yang du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs te bsdus zhugs te brtan par gyur pas rjes su mnyes par byed pa rnams ni yang dag yang du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: They are established in that aspect, and the light rays are gathered and enter the wheel, and one should meditate again and again on the satisfaction of the transcendent lords.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od mnyam par 'gyur te 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od mnyam par 'gyur te 'dra ba'o //
translated: The body of the Buddha becomes equal in light to Vairocana, and they are similar.

original: bskal pa gsum ni bskal pa chen po gsum mo //
analyzed: bskal pa gsum ni bskal pa chen po gsum mo //
translated: Three eons means three great eons.

original: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po mngon pa las brjod pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po mngon pa las brjod pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that the three incalculable eons are mentioned in the Abhidharma.

original: ye shes lnga ldan ni @90b ye shes lnga rnams sam de rnams nyid yin na yang bsten pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan ni @90b ye shes lnga rnams sam de rnams nyid yin na yang bsten pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Endowed with the five gnoses means that if the five gnoses are those, or if they are the same, one becomes stable by relying on them.

original: sku rdo rje'i gsang ba ston pas sku rdo rje'i gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i gsang ba ston pas sku rdo rje'i gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
translated: The secret of the Vajra Body is taught, so the secret of the Vajra Body is the Great Vajra Holder.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i ngo bo byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs par byed pa 'od zer gang la yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i ngo bo byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs par byed pa 'od zer gang la yin pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: The one who has the light rays that are the essence of the Vajra Body of all the Tathagatas, the Bodhisattva who is perfected, is just that.

original: chos ni 'dir 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: chos ni 'dir 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The Dharma here is the mandala of Amitabha.

original: rang gi yi ge a'a:'i sngags kyi skyes bu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi yi ge a'a:'i sngags kyi skyes bu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The person who is born from the mantra syllable AḤ is Amitābha.

original: ngag gi lam ste 'dren par ro //
analyzed: ngag gi lam ste 'dren par ro //
translated: The path of speech is the guide.

original: kha dog lnga'i 'od zer rnams ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir gang du rdo rje chen po yin pa de'o //
analyzed: kha dog lnga'i 'od zer rnams ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir gang du rdo rje chen po yin pa de'o //
translated: The great vajra is where there are light rays of five colors, because they are inseparable.

original: de'i rnam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag tu med pa'i mchog bsgom pas sems can gyi khams de'i rnam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo dam tshig gi ye shes yin te tshig ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngo bo rnams🔽kyi dam tshig ste de kho na nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag tu med pa'i mchog bsgom pas sems can gyi khams de'i rnam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo dam tshig gi ye shes yin te tshig ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngo bo rnams kyi dam tshig ste de kho na nyid yin la /
translated: The light rays of that form meditate on Amitābha, the lord of the world, and the realm of sentient beings is the reality of the bodhisattva form, which is the pledge wisdom.

original: de'i spros pa ni gsal bar byed pa yin te rdzogs par byas nas sdud pa la sogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i spros pa ni gsal bar byed pa yin te rdzogs par byas nas sdud pa la sogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The pledge of that is reality, and the proliferation of that is the illumination, which is the completion, and the creation of the gathering, and so on.

original: bstan pa ni chos sngar brjod ma thag pa ni ngag yin te de'i lam ni 'od dpag tu med pa yin la de la gnas pa ni bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: bstan pa ni chos sngar brjod ma thag pa ni ngag yin te de'i lam ni 'od dpag tu med pa yin la de la gnas pa ni bsgoms pas so //
translated: The teaching is the speech of the previously mentioned Dharma, and the path of that is Amitābha, and abiding in that is meditation.

original: rdo rje chos dang mtshungs pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje chos dang mtshungs pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang ngo //
translated: Being similar to Vajradharma is Amitābha.

original: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig yin te /
translated: That is the pledge of the vajra speech of all tathāgatas.

original: de las gang du 'byung ba de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de las gang du 'byung ba de de bzhin no //
translated: That which arises from that is just like that.

original: rdo rje ni 'dir mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'dir mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra here is the Akṣobhya maṇḍala.

original: de las yul tha dad pas snga ma dang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de las yul tha dad pas snga ma dang 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since it is a different object, there is no contradiction with the previous.

original: rang sngags skyes bu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rang sngags skyes bu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The being born from one’s mantra is Akṣobhya.

original: de'i sems la ste snying gar nyi ma la rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang na gnas pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba la'o //
analyzed: de'i sems la ste snying gar nyi ma la rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang na gnas pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba la'o //
translated: In his mind, that is, in the heart, on a sun, abiding in the center of the vajra, that is, in the center of the vajra at the heart of the gnosis being.

original: dam tshig chen po mi bskyod pa'i de kho na nyid h'um gi yi ge 'od zer kha dog lnga dang ldan no //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po mi bskyod pa'i de kho na nyid h'um gi yi ge 'od zer kha dog lnga dang ldan no //
translated: The great commitment Akṣobhya’s reality is the syllable hūṃ, endowed with five-colored light rays.

original: ye shes rdo rje 'dir sgrub pa po des bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje 'dir sgrub pa po des bya'o //
translated: The gnosis vajra is to be accomplished by that practitioner here.

original: de rnams 'dir thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin te /
analyzed: de rnams 'dir thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin te /
translated: All of them are here vajras,

original: rgyal ba yang yin pas de rnams phyogs bcur sems can gyi don byas shing sdud pa sngon du song bas thim pa gang yin pa'i h'um yig de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba yang yin pas de rnams phyogs bcur sems can gyi don byas shing sdud pa sngon du song bas thim pa gang yin pa'i h'um yig de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: and they are also victors, so they are called “those who, having performed the welfare of sentient beings in the ten directions, having previously gathered, dissolve,” and the syllable hūṃ is so called.

original: rdo rje'i thugs mi bskyod pa dang 'dra ba tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i thugs mi bskyod pa dang 'dra ba tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho yin no //
translated: He is the ocean of the qualities of immeasurable intuition, similar to the vajra mind Akṣhobhya.

original: dam tshig rdo rje mi bskyod pa yin la @91a * //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje mi bskyod pa yin la @91a * //
translated: Vajra means Akṣhobhya.

original: de'i yul can gyi ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: It is the samādhi whose object is him.🔽The great vajra is the great vajra-holder.

original: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin te rang gi dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin te rang gi dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on him in one’s own maṇḍala.

original: lus cha shas thams cad la kham gi 'od zer 'khrugs shing nam mkha' dang mnyam par bdag nyid bsgoms na dngos grub yin te rang gi 'dod pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus cha shas thams cad la kham gi 'od zer 'khrugs shing nam mkha' dang mnyam par bdag nyid bsgoms na dngos grub yin te rang gi 'dod pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates on oneself as equal to space, with the light rays of the syllable khaṃ agitated in all the parts of the body, one will attain power, and one will become invisible at will.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The commitment of the vajra of space is glorious Vajrasattva.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: He is just so, he who has a garland of light rays for the purpose of the invisibility of the vajras of body, speech, and mind.

original: gsang sngags skyes bu ni yi ge ma gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs gser gyi kha dog can gru bzhi pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgoms la snying gar yang yi ge ham yang ngo //
analyzed: gsang sngags skyes bu ni yi ge ma gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs gser gyi kha dog can gru bzhi pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgoms la snying gar yang yi ge ham yang ngo //
translated: The person of the Secret Mantra meditates on Mañjuśrī, the color of gold, in the center of a square vajra maṇḍala, with the syllable ma. At the heart is also the syllable haṃ.

original: de'i 'od zer dkar po rnams dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du bdag nyid gnas par bya ste chos thams cad ni rgyu dang bral ba'o zhes bsgom mo //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer dkar po rnams dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du bdag nyid gnas par bya ste chos thams cad ni rgyu dang bral ba'o zhes bsgom mo //
translated: One should dwell in the space between the white light rays and the moon maṇḍala, meditating that all phenomena are free from causes.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su son pa rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid la thlhim gi yi ge'i rang bzhin rdul phra rab thams cad mtshon cha'i mchog ma nyams pa las byung ba yid las byung ba'i snying po 'bar zhing rab tu gsal
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su son pa rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid la thlhim gi yi ge'i rang bzhin rdul phra rab thams cad mtshon cha'i mchog ma nyams pa las byung ba yid las byung ba'i snying po 'bar zhing rab tu gsal
translated: In the middle of the realm of space, in the center of the source of phenomena, one should meditate on Vairocana, the nature of the syllable hūṃ, arisen from all the subtle particles of the supreme weapon, undamaged, the essence of the mind, blazing, and very clear.

original: bar bsgoms pa na sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang mnyam pa 'grub po //
analyzed: bar bsgoms pa na sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang mnyam pa 'grub po //
translated: When one meditates on this, one achieves the body vajra, equal to Vairocana.

original: bse ru la sogs pa las khyad par du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mchog gi dam tshig dang ldan pa gzhan gyis mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bse ru la sogs pa las khyad par du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mchog gi dam tshig dang ldan pa gzhan gyis mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One who is endowed with the pledge of the supreme higher knowledge of a Buddha, which is superior to the higher knowledge of the rhinoceros-like and so forth, will become like one who has the five higher knowledges.

original: sangs rgyas sngon du song ba'i dkyil 'khor ni thams cad du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sngon du song ba'i dkyil 'khor ni thams cad du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the mandala of the Buddhas who have gone before is everywhere.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dir mi bskyod pa yin te de'i snying gar rdo rje lte ba la ye shes thob par byed pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'i aom yig bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dir mi bskyod pa yin te de'i snying gar rdo rje lte ba la ye shes thob par byed pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'i aom yig bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Here, Akshobhya is Vajrasattva, and one should meditate on the syllable Om at his heart, in the center of a vajra, together with light rays that cause the attainment of pristine awareness.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'dir rin chen tog ste de'i thugs kar rin po che la gnas pa'i yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'dir rin chen tog ste de'i thugs kar rin po che la gnas pa'i yi ge aom mo //
translated: Here, Ratnasambhava is Space Vajra, and at his heart is the syllable Om located on a jewel.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni 'dir 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni 'dir 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Here, Amitabha is Lochanavajra.

original: de'i thugs kar chos padma la gnas pa'i yi ge aom mo ;
analyzed: de'i thugs kar chos padma la gnas pa'i yi ge aom mo ;
translated: At his heart is the syllable Om located on a Dharma lotus.

original: / rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i autpala'i 'dab ma'i cha byad can gyi ral gri gang yin pa de la de skad du brjod de don yod rdo rje'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i autpala'i 'dab ma'i cha byad can gyi ral gri gang yin pa de la de skad du brjod de don yod rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is a sword having the shape of an utpala leaf, which is indivisible.

original: de'i snying gar dam tshig gi ral gri de la yi ge aom mo //
analyzed: de'i snying gar dam tshig gi ral gri de la yi ge aom mo //
translated: In the heart of that pledge-sword is the syllable oṃ.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying ga'i zla ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdo rje gsum gsal bar byed pa nang du zhugs @91b pa rdo rje gsum 'od zer dang bcas pa'i yi ge aom 'khor lo'i dbus su blta'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying ga'i zla ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdo rje gsum gsal bar byed pa nang du zhugs @91b pa rdo rje gsum 'od zer dang bcas pa'i yi ge aom 'khor lo'i dbus su blta'o //
translated: In the center of the wheel-moon at the heart of Vairocana, one should see the syllable oṃ of the three vajras, which is the illuminator of the three vajras, which has entered inside, together with light-rays, in the center of the wheel.

original: snga ma la yang zla ba la gnas pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: snga ma la yang zla ba la gnas pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that one should visualize it as standing on a moon, as before.

original: de'i thugs kar rdo rje la sogs pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: de'i thugs kar rdo rje la sogs pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that it stands on a moon in the heart of Akṣobhya, who stands in the center of the vajra, etc., in the heart of Vairocana.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje la sogs pa bsgoms te mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi skye mched kyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas mchog rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje la sogs pa bsgoms te mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi skye mched kyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas mchog rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that one should meditate on Akṣobhya-jñāna-vajra, etc. abiding in one’s maṇḍala, and that the supreme buddhas Vairocana, etc. are in the sense-spheres of eye, ear, nose, tongue, and body.

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that they are Kṣitigarbha, etc.

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that they are Kṣitigarbha, etc.

original: de rnams mngon par shes pa lnga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya ste des mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams mngon par shes pa lnga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya ste des mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should meditate on them by means of the five superknowledges, and thereby one will have the five superknowledges.

original: rang gi sngags las byung ba rdo rje 'am 'khor lo 'am rin po che la sogs pa de nyid du rang gi bdag po'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sngags las byung ba rdo rje 'am 'khor lo 'am rin po che la sogs pa de nyid du rang gi bdag po'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on that very five-pronged vajra, wheel, jewel, etc. arisen from one’s mantra by means of the application of one’s lord, it is said.

original: 'khor lo zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bhr'um las byung ba'i 'khor lo dkar po ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bhr'um las byung ba'i 'khor lo dkar po ste /
translated: The wheel is the white wheel arisen from the syllable bhrūṃ, which is located in the maṇḍala arisen from the vajra cross.🔽The syllable bhrūṃ on the moon in the center of that emits buddhas, and since they enter there, they are born from that.

original: de'i lte ba'i zla ba la bhr'um yig las sangs rgyas rnams spros te de nyid du bcug pas de las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi yan lag las byung bas sangs rgyas kyi rten gzhal yas khang ste de yang gru bzhi mnyam pa yin te mi mnyam
analyzed: de'i lte ba'i zla ba la bhr'um yig las sangs rgyas rnams spros te de nyid du bcug pas de las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi yan lag las byung bas sangs rgyas kyi rten gzhal yas khang ste de yang gru bzhi mnyam pa yin te mi mnyam
translated: Since they arise from the limbs of Vairocana, the celestial mansion is the support of the buddhas.

original: pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is also square and even, without unevenness.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor gsungs so //
translated: The statement “buddhas” and so on teaches the drop yoga.

original: phra mo'i rnal 'byor la thig le'i rnal 'byor ro zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor la thig le'i rnal 'byor ro zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that the drop yoga is the subtle yoga.

original: thugs ka ru ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i 'khor lo la aom yig gi sngags shes par bya ste /
analyzed: thugs ka ru ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i 'khor lo la aom yig gi sngags shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know that the mantra of the syllable oṃ is on the moon maṇḍala in the heart of the gnosis being in the heart.

original: rnam par shes pa des gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa des gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on that consciousness as nondual.

original: de las 'gog pa ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi rgyu ba nyid rdo rje ste de la son pa'i sems so //
analyzed: de las 'gog pa ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi rgyu ba nyid rdo rje ste de la son pa'i sems so //
translated: From that, the mind which has reached the vajra, i.e., the cessation of the non-flowing of the conceptualization of subject and object.

original: gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na //
analyzed: gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na //
translated: When it is born in that,

original: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: then that yogin becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem, fulfilling the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni sngags kyi thig ler son pa yin te lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni sngags kyi thig ler son pa yin te lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: The yoga of the drop is the attainment of the drop of mantra. The rest is as before.

original: kun gyi yang ni de rnams su //
analyzed: kun gyi yang ni de rnams su //
translated: And in all of them

original: rgyu mthun la sogs mos pas kyang //
analyzed: rgyu mthun la sogs mos pas kyang //
translated: by the aspiration for the natural and so forth

original: thig le phra mo gsang @92a * //
analyzed: thig le phra mo gsang @92a * //
translated: the drop is born subtle, secret,

original: gsum skyes // bsgom bya chung du sogs kyis mtshon //
analyzed: gsum skyes // bsgom bya chung du sogs kyis mtshon //
translated: and indicated by the small and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor bsnyen sogs de bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bsnyen sogs de bzhin no //
translated: The yoga is the approach and so forth, just so.

original: de nyid mtshon par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid mtshon par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: Because it is the indicator of reality, it should be seen in this way.

original: lus yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rtag pa spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga la gnas pa'i 'khor lo dkar po'i lte ba'i zla ba la gnas pa'i aom yig dkar po las byung ba'i ye shes kyi
analyzed: lus yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rtag pa spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga la gnas pa'i 'khor lo dkar po'i lte ba'i zla ba la gnas pa'i aom yig dkar po las byung ba'i ye shes kyi
translated: nectar light rays that arise from the white oṃ on the moon in the center of the white wheel at the crown, throat, and heart cakras that abide in one’s own wheel.

original: bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis rdul phra rab so so la khyab par bsgoms pas rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'grub ste bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis rdul phra rab so so la khyab par bsgoms pas rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'grub ste bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since those nectar light rays pervade each atom, one will be accomplished as similar to Vairocana and will remain for an eon.🔽Also, meditate on all the mantras abiding in the individual hand implements of Akṣobhya, Amitābha, and so on, abiding in one’s own wheel, as before.

original: rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rang gi phyag mtshan la gnas pa'i sngags sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba yang de bzhin du blta bar byas te nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir
analyzed: rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rang gi phyag mtshan la gnas pa'i sngags sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba yang de bzhin du blta bar byas te nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir
translated: Since this is an illustration,

original: gtso bo yin par bshad par bya ba'i ched du rigs gsum po bkod pa'o ;
analyzed: gtso bo yin par bshad par bya ba'i ched du rigs gsum po bkod pa'o ;
translated: the three families are explained to be the principal ones.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dam tshig gi de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dam tshig gi de kho na nyid rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
translated: He is the person who knows the reality of the pledge of the mantra of all the Tathagatas.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
translated: This concludes the eleventh chapter of the Sri-Guhyasamaja, the Ornament of the Vajra Essence.

original: // / de nas zhes pa ni brtson 'grus dang bdud rtsi lnga ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni brtson 'grus dang bdud rtsi lnga ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
translated: Then, after the desire of the disciples who ask, “How should one practice diligence and the five nectars?

original: gang dag gang gi dngos kyi 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i 'dod pa nges pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: gang dag gang gi dngos kyi 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i 'dod pa nges pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: What is the principal result of which one?,” etc.,

original: ngan song dang 'khor ba'i lam las sems can gyi khams bzlog ste mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam ston par byed pa ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: ngan song dang 'khor ba'i lam las sems can gyi khams bzlog ste mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam ston par byed pa ni ston pa'o //
translated: the teacher, who turns the realm of sentient beings away from the paths of the miserable realms and cyclic existence and shows them the paths to the higher realms and liberation,

original: sems can ma lus pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ni skyed byed do //
analyzed: sems can ma lus pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ni skyed byed do //
translated: the producer of the desire for the Tathagatas, etc., for the sake of all sentient beings without exception,

original: ye shes kyi mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can gyi rgyud la sgrub par byed pas de sgrub byed do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can gyi rgyud la sgrub par byed pas de sgrub byed do //
translated: the producer of the supreme intuition, who establishes that Tathagata in the continuum of sentient beings,

original: dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum gsal bar byed pa ni ngag nyid de tshad ma dang lung gi yul la de rnams kyis mi gnod pas rdo rje yin te bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum gsal bar byed pa ni ngag nyid de tshad ma dang lung gi yul la de rnams kyis mi gnod pas rdo rje yin te bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the very vajra that illuminates the three vajras, which is speech itself, since it is not harmed by those [objects] of valid cognition and scripture, and is therefore a vajra.

original: mkha' dang mtshungs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig tu gyur pa de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mkha' dang mtshungs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig tu gyur pa de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: It is a pledge because it is not to be transgressed, being equal to space, and it is of the nature of that [vajra], since it is nonconceptual by nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yang chos rnams nyid de de rnams la yang de ltar gyur pa yang yin te de kho na nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yang chos rnams nyid de de rnams la yang de ltar gyur pa yang yin te de kho na nyid kyis so //
translated: The phenomena themselves are pure by nature, and they are also just that, by means of reality.

original: kun rdzob tu mos pa sna @92b tshogs pa'i gdul bya'i sems can gyi don du rol mo 'di yin te 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu mos pa sna @92b tshogs pa'i gdul bya'i sems can gyi don du rol mo 'di yin te 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The play is for the sake of sentient beings to be trained, who have various interests, in the conventional sense, and it is of the nature of the mantras and so forth that are to be explained.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis skyes bu mchog gi don thob par byed pas phul du byung bas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis skyes bu mchog gi don thob par byed pas phul du byung bas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: It should be cultivated by yogins and yoginīs, since it brings about the attainment of the goal of the supreme person, and is therefore excellent.

original: de la gnyis gar dpag tshad bco lnga'i tshad ma dang ldan pa grong la sogs pa spangs pa ni dgon pa chen po'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: de la gnyis gar dpag tshad bco lnga'i tshad ma dang ldan pa grong la sogs pa spangs pa ni dgon pa chen po'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: In this regard, some say that a great forest is fifteen yojanas in size, and is devoid of villages and so forth.

original: mam zhes pa ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje bskyed pa'i sa bon gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mam zhes pa ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje bskyed pa'i sa bon gsungs pa'o //
translated: The syllable mam is said to be the seed of Manjushri.

original: mi snang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyir yang rang gi dkyil 'khor la 'jam pa'i rdo rje de nyid rab tu bsgoms te /
analyzed: mi snang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyir yang rang gi dkyil 'khor la 'jam pa'i rdo rje de nyid rab tu bsgoms te /
translated: For the sake of the power of invisibility, one should visualize that very Manjushri in one's own mandala.

original: nyi ma so sor thun bzhi ru //
analyzed: nyi ma so sor thun bzhi ru //
translated: Every day, in four sessions,

original: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan par //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan par //
translated: endowed with the yoga of the three samadhis,

original: gyur pas yang dag dngos grub sgrub //
analyzed: gyur pas yang dag dngos grub sgrub //
translated: one should practice for the sake of the supreme power.

original: thun mong cig shos dngos grub ni //
analyzed: thun mong cig shos dngos grub ni //
translated: The common and supreme powers

original: zhes pa'i cho gas thun mtshams par mar de sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams la zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon ma 'od zer dang bcas pa mtshan ma thob pas yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i cho gas thun mtshams par mar de sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams la zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon ma 'od zer dang bcas pa mtshan ma thob pas yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: are attained by the rite, in the intervals of the sessions, of visualizing the seed syllable on the moon in the body, speech, and mind wheels of Manjushri, together with light rays, by one who has attained the signs.

original: aa'i sgo ni chos thams cad yin te dang po nas skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir dang chos thams cad 'chi ba dang bral ba yin no zhes de kho na nyid kyi don mngon sum du bya ste de nyid du spro ba la sogs pa yang dang yang
analyzed: aa'i sgo ni chos thams cad yin te dang po nas skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir dang chos thams cad 'chi ba dang bral ba yin no zhes de kho na nyid kyi don mngon sum du bya ste de nyid du spro ba la sogs pa yang dang yang
translated: Having actualized the meaning of reality, one should repeatedly engage in the emanation and so forth right there.

original: du byas na 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du byas na 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does that, one will become equal to Manjushrivajra.

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i mchog gi dam tshig de sgrub par byed pa de ni rang gi 'dod pas mi mngon par byed do //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i mchog gi dam tshig de sgrub par byed pa de ni rang gi 'dod pas mi mngon par byed do //
translated: That which accomplishes the supreme commitment of Manjushrivajra is made invisible by one's desire.

original: phul du byung ba thob pa dang lhas rjes su gnang ba thob pas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa dang gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi lnga cha ji lta ba bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshad tsam pa'i ri lu la zangs ma
analyzed: phul du byung ba thob pa dang lhas rjes su gnang ba thob pas 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa dang gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi lnga cha ji lta ba bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshad tsam pa'i ri lu la zangs ma
translated: Having attained the supreme and having attained the permission of the deity, the yogi/nī of Manjushrivajra or any other should make a pill of the five nectars in the proper proportion, the size of which will be explained, with copper

original: cha gcig dang dngul gnyis dang gser bzhis go rims ji lta bar dkris te rang gi kha 'am rig ma'i kha ga mu khar bcug ste de'i nang du chud pa'i sangs rgyas rnams spro ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du'o //
analyzed: cha gcig dang dngul gnyis dang gser bzhis go rims ji lta bar dkris te rang gi kha 'am rig ma'i kha ga mu khar bcug ste de'i nang du chud pa'i sangs rgyas rnams spro ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du'o //
translated: One part, two parts, four parts, and four parts, respectively, are wrapped around, and placed in one’s own mouth or the mouth of the knowledge consort, and the buddhas that are contained within it are emanated, and so forth, for as long as one blazes.

original: de nas 'phar na de'i steng du gser gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'phar na de'i steng du gser gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, if one jumps, one will stop by meditating on a golden circle above.

original: de gzing ba nyid kyis de dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzing ba nyid kyis de dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that very jumping, one will become equal to that.

original: de bzhin nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gnyug ma'i sa bon las byung ba'i rang gi phyag mtshan de dang de'i rigs kyi gnas sngar bzhin du @93a * //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gnyug ma'i sa bon las byung ba'i rang gi phyag mtshan de dang de'i rigs kyi gnas sngar bzhin du @93a * //
translated: A yogin of Akṣobhya, and so on, of suchness, should meditate on his own insignia arisen from the innate seed in the place of that type, as before.

original: bsgom par byas na de dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom par byas na de dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does so, one will become equal to that.

original: sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rje dang chos rnams ni gti mug dang zhe sdang dang 'dod chags kyi rigs rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rje dang chos rnams ni gti mug dang zhe sdang dang 'dod chags kyi rigs rnams so //
translated: All buddhas, vajras, and phenomena are the types of delusion, hatred, and desire, respectively.

original: sngar brjod pa'i ri lu'i sgrub thabs kyi lhag ma gsungs pa yi ge aom la sogs pa las grub pa sngar brjod pa'i nang du son pa'i rang gi lha'i 'khor lo'i ri lu rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngar bzhin du bsgoms na de
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i ri lu'i sgrub thabs kyi lhag ma gsungs pa yi ge aom la sogs pa las grub pa sngar brjod pa'i nang du son pa'i rang gi lha'i 'khor lo'i ri lu rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngar bzhin du bsgoms na de
translated: and if the yogin of Vairocana, etc., meditates on it as before, he

original: dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: becomes equal to it.

original: sngar brjod pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lhag ma gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lhag ma gsungs pa /
translated: The remainder of the previously mentioned practice of the wheel, etc., is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil gnas pa'i //
translated: In the center of the clear sky

original: rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas lag pa g-yas par 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon las byung ba 'od zer dang bcas pa mdun du bzung ste sngar bzhin du bsgoms na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas lag pa g-yas par 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon las byung ba 'od zer dang bcas pa mdun du bzung ste sngar bzhin du bsgoms na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin of permanence holds in his right hand his own wheel-included maṇḍala arisen from his own seed, together with light rays, in front, and if he meditates on it as before, he becomes a wheel vidyādhara.

original: de bzhin du rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i rang gi mtshan ma'i nang du chud pa rang gi 'khor lo lag pa g-yas par bsgoms pas sngar bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i rang gi mtshan ma'i nang du chud pa rang gi 'khor lo lag pa g-yas par bsgoms pas sngar bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas
translated: Likewise, the yogin of Akṣobhya, etc. who is situated in his own wheel, having meditated on his own sign arisen from his own seed, contained within his own wheel, in his right hand, as before, by obtaining the sign,

original: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: he becomes a vajra-holder, etc.

original: rtse gsum la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag mtshan la yang 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtse gsum la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag mtshan la yang 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: This is also to be accomplished with one's own sign, such as a trident, etc.

original: rtse gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtse gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is stated by trident, etc.

original: rdo rje rnams sam rdo rje dang 'dra ba dgug pa ste sbyor ba gsum ni ting nge 'dzin gsum po de yang yin la sngags kyi skyes bu yang yin te rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje rnams sam rdo rje dang 'dra ba dgug pa ste sbyor ba gsum ni ting nge 'dzin gsum po de yang yin la sngags kyi skyes bu yang yin te rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The three concentrations are also the three vajras, or the three hookings, i.e. the three applications, and also the mantra-persons, i.e. the nature of the vajra-holders situated in one's own wheel.

original: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pa 'di rnams kyis sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rdul phra rab las byung ba rdo rje lcags kyu yang lag pa g-yas su bsgoms te mtshan ma thob pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' des bkug ste rang gi bkas bskul bar
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um / zhes pa 'di rnams kyis sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rdul phra rab las byung ba rdo rje lcags kyu yang lag pa g-yas su bsgoms te mtshan ma thob pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' des bkug ste rang gi bkas bskul bar
translated: With these, Oṃ āḥ hūṃ, one should meditate on a vajra hook arising from the subtle particles of vajra body, speech, and mind in one's right hand, and having attained the sign, one should summon Vajrasattva residing on the wind maṇḍala with that, and one should be urged by one's own order.

original: bya'o // gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa yang 'di bzhin du nye bar bkug ste nye bar longs spyod do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: bya'o // gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa yang 'di bzhin du nye bar bkug ste nye bar longs spyod do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one should summon yakṣiṇīs and so on in the same way, and enjoy them.

original: bcu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ten and so on refers to this.

original: de bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgoms @93b te ;
analyzed: de bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgoms @93b te ;
translated: In the same way, a yogin of Akṣobhya and so on should meditate on a wheel hook and so on residing in his own wheel,

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dgug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dgug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and summon buddhas and so on, is stated by Vairocana and so on.

original: gang gi rnal 'byor pas 'gugs pa de mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa rnam pa kun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi rnal 'byor pas 'gugs pa de mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa rnam pa kun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yogi who summons that one should meditate on her endowed with the thirty-two marks and eighty signs.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i rig ma la rjes su chags par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i rig ma la rjes su chags par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Endowed with the yoga of one's deity, one should be passionate toward the knowledge woman, such as the yakṣī.

original: rdo rje'i sku ni ye shes lnga rnam par byang ba'i phung po gang gi yin pa de ni 'dir rang gi bdag po'i lha'i gzugs de de bzhin du yin te de ni rang dang de rnams kyang rig ma rang 'od kyi shes rab kyi rnam par bsgom par
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni ye shes lnga rnam par byang ba'i phung po gang gi yin pa de ni 'dir rang gi bdag po'i lha'i gzugs de de bzhin du yin te de ni rang dang de rnams kyang rig ma rang 'od kyi shes rab kyi rnam par bsgom par
translated: The one whose vajra body is the aggregate of the five gnoses' complete purification, that one is here the form of one's lord deity. That is just so. One should meditate on oneself and those as the knowledge woman, one's own light's wisdom.

original: bya'o // de'i gsang ba'i padmar yi ge h'um bkod pa kha dog dmar po 'od zer lnga 'bar ba la rtse mo na ho yod pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lce ste sbyor ba ni gzhug pa dang dbyung ba'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'bab pa
analyzed: bya'o // de'i gsang ba'i padmar yi ge h'um bkod pa kha dog dmar po 'od zer lnga 'bar ba la rtse mo na ho yod pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lce ste sbyor ba ni gzhug pa dang dbyung ba'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'bab pa
translated: The secret lotus of that one is marked with the syllable hūṃ, red in color, blazing with five-colored light rays, with a ho at the tip, the tongue of a five-pointed vajra. The union is the union of insertion and withdrawal. The bodhicitta drop falls to the tip of the vajra.

original: la thug pa'i de dbyung ba'i rtsa des bskul ba'o //
analyzed: la thug pa'i de dbyung ba'i rtsa des bskul ba'o //
translated: That is aroused by the channel that withdraws it.

original: rig ma thams cad la rjes su chags pa'i mthu de rnams kyis gsung rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig ma thams cad la rjes su chags pa'i mthu de rnams kyis gsung rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By those powers of passion for all the knowledge consorts, one becomes like the vajra of speech.

original: de'i rjes la gsang ba gsum ni sku la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de yin la dam tshig kyang yin te de ni sdom pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la gsang ba gsum ni sku la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de yin la dam tshig kyang yin te de ni sdom pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: After that, the three secrets are those of the body, and so on, and also the commitments, which are the observances.

original: shin tu dad pa zhes pa la sogs pa brgyud phyi ma las brjod pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dad pa zhes pa la sogs pa brgyud phyi ma las brjod pa'o //
translated: “With great faith” and so on are stated in the continuation of the tantra.

original: mchod pa'i mchog kyang thams cad las gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te mchod pa de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po'i mchod pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams so //
analyzed: mchod pa'i mchog kyang thams cad las gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te mchod pa de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po'i mchod pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams so //
translated: The supreme worship is also the most important of all, because those worships are the cause of the great bliss worship of all the Tathagatas.

original: yang dag par mchod pa ni rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i dga' ba chen po la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par mchod pa ni rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i dga' ba chen po la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The perfect worship is the worship of great joy, etc. which arises from the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: mchog tu zag pa med pa bsgoms pas thun mong dang cig shos kyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zag pa med pa bsgoms pas thun mong dang cig shos kyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The supreme, uncontaminated worship should be accomplished by the meditation of the common and uncommon siddhis.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni de mchog tu zag pa med pa bde ba chen po dngos grub thams cad kyi nang na snying por gyur pa gsang ba bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni de mchog tu zag pa med pa bde ba chen po dngos grub thams cad kyi nang na snying por gyur pa gsang ba bsdus pa'o //
translated: Because this is the supreme, uncontaminated, great bliss, the essence of all siddhis, the secret compendium.

original: brtson 'grus lnga dang bdud rtsi rnams gang gis gang gtso bor gyur pa'i 'bras bu de gsungs pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus lnga dang bdud rtsi rnams gang gis gang gtso bor gyur pa'i 'bras bu de gsungs pa /
translated: He states the result of which of the five perseverances and nectars is the most important.

original: sha chen zhes pa la sogs pa ste gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams te gang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de mchog ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya ba'o //🔽bza' ba'i @94a * //
analyzed: sha chen zhes pa la sogs pa ste gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams te gang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de mchog ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya ba'o // bza' ba'i @94a * //
translated: The three beginning with “great flesh” are the vajras of body and so on, which are the supreme, that is, the perfect buddhas, of Akṣhobhya and so on.

original: dam tshig bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi lhan cig byed pa nyid kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: dam tshig bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi lhan cig byed pa nyid kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: The pledge of eating is taught in order to establish that it is not to be transgressed because it is the very means of accomplishing the path to unexcelled awakening.

original: rnam pa thams cad med na yang //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad med na yang //
translated: Even though all things are nonexistent,

original: thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag ste /
analyzed: thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag ste /
translated: all things are imagined by the mind.

original: rang gi sems so sor snang ba tsam las gzhan pa bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa tshad ma dang lung gis de dang der sun phyung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi sems so sor snang ba tsam las gzhan pa bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa tshad ma dang lung gis de dang der sun phyung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: There is nothing to be eaten and so on other than the mere appearance of one’s own mind, because valid cognition and scripture have refuted them in this and that way.

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma rnyed na 'gyod pa med do zhes 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma rnyed na 'gyod pa med do zhes 'di gsungs so //
translated: Even those who abide in the pledges and vows should not regret it if they do not find it.

original: gang 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i lung las /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i lung las /
translated: It is said in the scriptures of the noble elders:

original: bshang dang gci bas dang ni //
analyzed: bshang dang gci bas dang ni //
translated: Excrement, urine,

original: thal ba dang bzhi 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: thal ba dang bzhi 'di rnams ni //
translated: and ashes, these four,

original: rang gi blangs te bsten par bya //
analyzed: rang gi blangs te bsten par bya //
translated: one should take up and rely on,

original: drang srong chen pos gnang ba yin //
analyzed: drang srong chen pos gnang ba yin //
translated: as permitted by the Great Sage.

original: zhes so // lhan cig byed pa nyid shin tu gsal bar gsungs pa 'dis zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes so // lhan cig byed pa nyid shin tu gsal bar gsungs pa 'dis zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: This very clear statement of the cooperating factors is stated by “this” and so forth.

original: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad las /
analyzed: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad las /
translated: In the Shri-Buddha-Avatamsaka🔽it is said:🔽Even for those who have become inferior mandalas

original: dkyil 'khor dman par gyur pa dang // dam tshig spangs par gyur pa la 'ang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dman par gyur pa dang // dam tshig spangs par gyur pa la 'ang //
translated: and have abandoned the commitments,

original: dngos grub cung zad grub pa med //
analyzed: dngos grub cung zad grub pa med //
translated: there is no accomplishment of even a little siddhi.

original: gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes pas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes pas //
translated: Because they do not know the reality of the secret,

original: de rnams rjes su sgrub par byed pa ni ji ltar lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bstan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams rjes su sgrub par byed pa ni ji ltar lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bstan pa gsungs pa /
translated: the one who accomplishes them in that way is taught to be the cooperating factor.

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
translated: The one endowed with the best of all aspects

original: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can te rang gi bdag po'i lha'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can te rang gi bdag po'i lha'o //
translated: is the one with the vajra body, speech, and mind, that is, one’s own deity.

original: 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The gnosis being is in the heart of the one with the wheel.

original: dbu rgyan nyid rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: dbu rgyan nyid rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: The crown itself is the holder of the supreme vajra.

original: rigs kyi bdag po yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the lord of the family.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa ni thugs ka'i zla ba'i nang du chud pa dang dkyil 'khor pa rnams so so la de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa ni thugs ka'i zla ba'i nang du chud pa dang dkyil 'khor pa rnams so so la de rnams kyis so //
translated: All the buddhas are pleased by the moon in the heart, and by each of the members of the mandala.

original: dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa pos bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa pos bya'o //
translated: The adept of the supreme commitment should do this.

original: gang gi phyir 'di'i dam tshig kyang 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir tshul yang yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di'i dam tshig kyang 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir tshul yang yin la /
translated: Because this is also a rule, since the commitment should not be transgressed,

original: lam gyi lhan cig byed pa yin pas mchog kyang yin te /
analyzed: lam gyi lhan cig byed pa yin pas mchog kyang yin te /
translated: and it is supreme, since it is the co-creator of the path,

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it causes the attainment of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason it is said:🔽The supreme of all powers is accomplished.

original: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i mchog / lce'i rtse mor dam tshig bsgrub pa'i don du zla ba la gnas pa'i nas kyi tshad tsam pa'i rdo rje dkar po ste de'i lte ba la yi ge h'um nyid rdo rje can bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i mchog / lce'i rtse mor dam tshig bsgrub pa'i don du zla ba la gnas pa'i nas kyi tshad tsam pa'i rdo rje dkar po ste de'i lte ba la yi ge h'um nyid rdo rje can bsgom par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the commitment at the tip of the tongue, one should meditate on the vajra, the size of a barley grain, standing on the moon, and in its center the syllable hum itself, the vajra-holder.

original: tha mal lus kyi chos rnams @94b la ;
analyzed: tha mal lus kyi chos rnams @94b la ;
translated: The ordinary phenomena of the body,

original: / dri ma lnga rnams mdzes pa ni //
analyzed: / dri ma lnga rnams mdzes pa ni //
translated: The five impurities are beautiful,

original: ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas //
translated: consecrated by the five intuitions.

original: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: They are explained as the five nectars.🔽The dawn, and likewise the dusk,

original: sbar dang de bzhin srod pa dang // sbar bar bya dang gzugs snang ba //
analyzed: sbar dang de bzhin srod pa dang // sbar bar bya dang gzugs snang ba //
translated: the dawn-maker, and the appearance of forms,

original: sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas //
translated: are applied to the body of mantra.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya //
translated: The five nectars are to be eaten.

original: rdo rje h'um las byung ba ni //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um las byung ba ni //
translated: Arisen from the vajra hūṃ,

original: bar snang la gnas bsam par bya //
analyzed: bar snang la gnas bsam par bya //
translated: one should imagine it abiding in space.

original: a'a: las byung ba'i padma ni //
analyzed: a'a: las byung ba'i padma ni //
translated: The lotus arisen from āḥ

original: de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya //
translated: is to be meditated on below it.

original: yi ge aom mtshan bdud rtsi ni //
analyzed: yi ge aom mtshan bdud rtsi ni //
translated: The nectar marked with the letter oṃ

original: de yi dbus su gzhug par bya //🔽rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: de yi dbus su gzhug par bya // rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: is to be placed in its center.

original: sbar nas tshim byas rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: sbar nas tshim byas rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin, having churned it with the vajra and lotus in union,🔽should satisfy the deities.

original: shel dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba ni //🔽ye shes nyi ma bzhin du mchog / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi //
analyzed: shel dang mtshungs pa'i snang ba ni // ye shes nyi ma bzhin du mchog / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi //
translated: The appearance like crystal🔽is the supreme intuition sun.🔽Having drawn with the supreme weapon

original: mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni //
analyzed: mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni //
translated: from the world systems of the ten directions,

original: bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang //
analyzed: bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang //
translated: the nectar is caused to descend there.

original: bza' ba'i rnal 'byor gyis bza' bya //
analyzed: bza' ba'i rnal 'byor gyis bza' bya //
translated: The yoga of eating is the eating.

original: bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis //
translated: The accomplishment of the object to be accomplished is by the rite.

original: de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza' //
analyzed: de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza' //
translated: In the same way, one should eat the five heroes.

original: yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya //
analyzed: yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya //
translated: They are generated from the three seed-syllables.

original: gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: Otherwise, they are not accomplished.

original: zhes rgyud phyi ma las brjod pa //
analyzed: zhes rgyud phyi ma las brjod pa //
translated: This is stated in the Later Tantra.

original: bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor ba zos na sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams gang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid thob par 'gyur zhes pa 'dir shin tu gsal bar lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor ba zos na sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnams gang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid thob par 'gyur zhes pa 'dir shin tu gsal bar lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'di gsungs so //
translated: If one eats the combination of the five nectars, one attains the reality of Akṣobhya and so forth, the vajras of body and so forth. This is very clearly stated here as the cooperating condition.

original: a'a: yig dang aom yig gi dam tshig ni de dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: a'a: yig dang aom yig gi dam tshig ni de dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The commitments of the syllable A and the syllable Om are for the sake of purifying those.

original: mtshon par byed pa yin pa'i phyir yi ge h'um yang 'phangs pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: mtshon par byed pa yin pa'i phyir yi ge h'um yang 'phangs pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that the syllable Hum is also cast out because it is the agent of the indication.

original: a'a: ni padma'i snod kyi sa bon yin la aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi 'gugs par byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: a'a: ni padma'i snod kyi sa bon yin la aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi 'gugs par byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that A is the seed of the lotus vessel and Om is the cause of summoning the nectar of the tathāgatas.

original: de gsungs pa //
analyzed: de gsungs pa //
translated: That is taught.

original: 'bar ba'i aom gyis byin brlabs rlung dang me'i //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i aom gyis byin brlabs rlung dang me'i //
translated: The wind and fire mandalas are consecrated with the blazing oṃ,

original: dkyil 'khor la gnas rab tu bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la gnas rab tu bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: and the five nectars are placed on them.

original: de nas yi ge gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i //
analyzed: de nas yi ge gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i //
translated: Then, reciting the three syllables, the immeasurable

original: thub pa'i dbang po nang du chud par bya //
analyzed: thub pa'i dbang po nang du chud par bya //
translated: lord of sages is caused to enter inside.

original: ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni //🔽h'um dgod rdo rje lce ni bzang po dang // snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni // h'um dgod rdo rje lce ni bzang po dang // snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus pa'i //
translated: Having contemplated the essence of the nectar of wisdom,🔽the excellent vajra tongue, with hūṃ,

original: rgyal ba'i 'khor lo des ni tshim par bya //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'khor lo des ni tshim par bya //
translated: the wheel of the victors in the middle of the moon at the heart is satisfied.

original: dam tshig nyid ni rdo rje yin la de nyid bdud rtsi yin te de ni phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: dam tshig nyid ni rdo rje yin la de nyid bdud rtsi yin te de ni phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Vajra is the commitment, and that is the nectar. This is the samādhi called “the garland.”

original: snga ma ni gtso bo yin la 'di yang thun mong gi 'bras bu gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: snga ma ni gtso bo yin la 'di yang thun mong gi 'bras bu gsungs pa ste /
translated: The former is the principal one, and this one also teaches the common result.

original: 'di ni srog chags thams @95a * //
analyzed: 'di ni srog chags thams @95a * //
translated: This is the killing of all living beings,

original: cad gsad pa la sogs pa mi dge ba spangs pa nyid gzung bar bya ste gzhan du na ngan song gi lam nyid de /
analyzed: cad gsad pa la sogs pa mi dge ba spangs pa nyid gzung bar bya ste gzhan du na ngan song gi lam nyid de /
translated: and so on, which should be taken up as the abandonment of nonvirtue. Otherwise, it is the path to the lower realms.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: nor gyi don du srog chags gsod //
analyzed: nor gyi don du srog chags gsod //
translated: For the sake of wealth, one kills living beings.

original: sha yi don du nor sbyin pa //
analyzed: sha yi don du nor sbyin pa //
translated: For the sake of meat, one gives wealth.

original: gnyis ka sdig pa'i las can phyir //
analyzed: gnyis ka sdig pa'i las can phyir //
translated: Since both are sinful actions,

original: sngags kyi dngos grub mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags kyi dngos grub mi 'gyur ro //
translated: one will not attain the powers of the mantra.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: He said this:

original: srog chags gsad par mi bya ste //
analyzed: srog chags gsad par mi bya ste //
translated: Do not kill living beings.

original: dkon mchog gsum po spang mi bya //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum po spang mi bya //
translated: Do not abandon the Three Jewels.

original: lha gzhan la ni phyag mi btsal //
analyzed: lha gzhan la ni phyag mi btsal //
translated: Do not bow to other deities.

original: yi ge brgya pa bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa bsgrub par bya //
translated: Practice the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: rdo rje gsum po thob 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po thob 'gyur phyir //
translated: In order to attain the three vajras.

original: zhes gsungs pas de shin tu gtso bo nyid du gsungs pa //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas de shin tu gtso bo nyid du gsungs pa //
translated: Thus, it is said to be extremely important.

original: rdo rje gsum yang yin la dam tshig kyang yin pas de'i dngos grub nyid ni mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum yang yin la dam tshig kyang yin pas de'i dngos grub nyid ni mchog go //
translated: Since it is both the three vajras and the commitments, its power is supreme.

original: des ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed pa dang rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du yon tan rin po che ma lus pa'i rten du yang 'gyur bas rang dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
analyzed: des ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed pa dang rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du yon tan rin po che ma lus pa'i rten du yang 'gyur bas rang dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
translated: By that, like a wish-fulfilling gem, one fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings, and like a great ocean, one becomes the support of all precious qualities without exception. Thus, one's own and others' goals will be completely fulfilled.

original: // brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga byin gyis brlab pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: // brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga byin gyis brlab pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of the consecration of the five kinds of striving is stated:

original: 'jig rten zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The world, etc.

original: mchog gi dngos grub kyi mthu bor te thun mong gi dngos grub gsungs pa 'khor lo'i dam tshig ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub kyi mthu bor te thun mong gi dngos grub gsungs pa 'khor lo'i dam tshig ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Having set aside the power of the supreme attainment, the common attainment is stated: The pledge of the wheel is the wheel knowledge-woman.🔽Among all the supreme pledges, the vajra knowledge-woman, etc.,

original: dam tshig mchog thams cad la rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung ba'i gzhan thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog thams cad la rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung ba'i gzhan thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur ro //
translated: one becomes the chief of all the others.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad dam tshig mchog tu grub pa yin na rdo rje sku'i mthu las so //
analyzed: thams cad dam tshig mchog tu grub pa yin na rdo rje sku'i mthu las so //
translated: Because of the power of the vajra body, all are established in the supreme pledge.

original: mi snang bar gyur pa thams cad la gang yang rung ba cig grub na stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa yin pa dang grub pa gzhan rnams kyi lha'i bu mo mchog rnams phrogs te phrogs nas kyang longs spyod do //
analyzed: mi snang bar gyur pa thams cad la gang yang rung ba cig grub na stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa yin pa dang grub pa gzhan rnams kyi lha'i bu mo mchog rnams phrogs te phrogs nas kyang longs spyod do //
translated: For all who have become invisible, if one is accomplished, one illuminates the trichiliocosm, and having stolen the supreme celestial maidens of the other accomplishments, one enjoys them.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa'i mthu gsungs pa gang g'a'i bye ma mnyam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa'i mthu gsungs pa gang g'a'i bye ma mnyam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The power of the Buddha's superknowledges is stated in the line equal to the sands of the Ganges, and so forth.

original: 'di rnams kyi don sku rdo rje la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de grub pa na sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa gzhan gyi don ma lus pa bsgrub pa la sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi don sku rdo rje la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de grub pa na sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa gzhan gyi don ma lus pa bsgrub pa la sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod
translated: The meaning of these is that when the perfection of the vajra body, and so forth, is accomplished, one has the nature of the vajra body, and so forth, and by the means of various emanations, one practices in all world systems for the sake of accomplishing the welfare of others without exception.

original: do // 'di thams cad kyis kyang gsungs pa /
analyzed: do // 'di thams cad kyis kyang gsungs pa /
translated: All of this is stated in the following:

original: mtho ris dang thar pa la sogs pa ma lus pa rnams kyis rang dang gzhan gyi @95b don bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dir mkhas pa rnams kyis thos pa la sogs pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: mtho ris dang thar pa la sogs pa ma lus pa rnams kyis rang dang gzhan gyi @95b don bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dir mkhas pa rnams kyis thos pa la sogs pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
translated: In order to accomplish the welfare of self and other by means of all the heavens, liberation, and so forth, the wise ones here should strive in listening, and so forth.

original: 'di dag thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro ba yin no zhes gsungs pa bsnyen pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro ba yin no zhes gsungs pa bsnyen pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All of this is preceded by the three meditative stabilizations.

original: bsnyen par bya bas na bsnyen pa ste shes rab yin la yang dag par rtogs par bya bas na dam tshig ste thabs yin zhing de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa ni sbyor ba ste de yin no //
analyzed: bsnyen par bya bas na bsnyen pa ste shes rab yin la yang dag par rtogs par bya bas na dam tshig ste thabs yin zhing de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa ni sbyor ba ste de yin no //
translated: Since one is brought near to enlightenment, it is the approximation, which is wisdom. Since one is brought near to perfect realization, it is the pledge, which is method. Their union is the yoga.

original: sgrub pa dang nye bas na nye ba'i sgrub pa'i ste de nyid gang las 'byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba ni de yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang nye bas na nye ba'i sgrub pa'i ste de nyid gang las 'byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba ni de yin no //
translated: Since it is near to the accomplishment, it is the near accomplishment, which is the origin of the fully transformed result, the nature of omniscience.

original: 'dis sgrub par byed pas na sgrub pa ste h'um yig la sogs pa yin la de rnams kyi don de grub pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo chos dang longs spyod dang // sprul pa rnams kyis sems can ma lus pa'i don gyi sgrub pa'i ngo bo skyes bu byed pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: 'dis sgrub par byed pas na sgrub pa ste h'um yig la sogs pa yin la de rnams kyi don de grub pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo chos dang longs spyod dang // sprul pa rnams kyis sems can ma lus pa'i don gyi sgrub pa'i ngo bo skyes bu byed pa'i ngo bo yin te /
