translated: Since it accomplishes, it is the accomplishment, which is the syllable hum and so on. The accomplishment of their aims is the nature of the three bodies, the nature of the person, which is the accomplishment of the aims of all sentient beings through the dharmakaya, sambhogakaya and nirmanakaya.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nges par bya ba nyid kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pa'i phyir dam tshig kyang yin no //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nges par bya ba nyid kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pa'i phyir dam tshig kyang yin no //
translated: It is also a pledge, because it is not to be transgressed by any one of the Tathagatas.

original: chen po yang yin la bsgrub pa yang yin te bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma bkrus pas dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pas na de nyid bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: chen po yang yin la bsgrub pa yang yin te bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma bkrus pas dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pas na de nyid bzhi pa yin no //
translated: It is the great practice, because it is the cause of the stainless fruit, by washing away the stains of the afflictions and the knowable, together with their instincts.

original: bye brag ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: bye brag ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis so //
translated: The distinctions are the distinctions of lesser, middling, and greater.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dbye bas so zhes gzhan dag go //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dbye bas so zhes gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say that it is the distinction of the five clans of Vajra Body, etc.

original: thun mong ba dang bar ma dang mchog gi dbye bas so zhes gzhan no //
analyzed: thun mong ba dang bar ma dang mchog gi dbye bas so zhes gzhan no //
translated: Others say that it is the distinction of the common, the middling, and the supreme.

original: shes par bya ba ni thun bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni thun bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The object of knowledge is to be cultivated in four sessions.

original: de nas thun mtshams su thun mong dang gzhan gyi las rnams kyi dngos grub kyi ngo bo rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thun mtshams su thun mong dang gzhan gyi las rnams kyi dngos grub kyi ngo bo rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the intervals of the sessions, one should accomplish the essences of the powers of the common and other actions.

original: 'di dag nyid gsal por gsungs pa bsnyen pa yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pas dngos po ma lus pa'i rang bzhin med pa nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin no //🔽ting nge 'dzin du byed pas ting nge 'dzin te rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa de'i gnyen por gyur pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyi thabs aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&
analyzed: 'di dag nyid gsal por gsungs pa bsnyen pa yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pas dngos po ma lus pa'i rang bzhin med pa nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo yin no // ting nge 'dzin du byed pas ting nge 'dzin te rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa de'i gnyen por gyur pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyi thabs aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&
translated: This is clearly stated: The approach is the nature of the realization that all things are essenceless, because it abandons the apprehended and apprehender.

original: ham zhes pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: ham zhes pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: It is concentration because it is made into meditative concentration. It is the antidote to the clinging to the nirvana of the pratyekabuddhas and so forth. It is the focus on the great compassion, the method whose nature is the mantra Oṃ dharmadhātu svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: de dag gi sbyor ba ni de yin no //🔽mchog @96a * //
analyzed: de dag gi sbyor ba ni de yin no // mchog @96a * //
translated: The application of those is that.

original: ni gtso bo yin pas so //
analyzed: ni gtso bo yin pas so //
translated: The supreme is the principal.

original: bsgom par bya ste byang chub mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ste byang chub mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is to be cultivated, because it leads to the attainment of supreme enlightenment.

original: nye ba'i sgrub pa nyid ni de'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir sgrub pa mchog ste der bya ba la stong pa nyid 'dir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i sgrub pa nyid ni de'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir sgrub pa mchog ste der bya ba la stong pa nyid 'dir rdo rje'o //
translated: The near-accomplishment is the supreme accomplishment because it is the cause of that. In that, the vajra is this emptiness.

original: de'i rang bzhin rnams ni 'phel bar byed pas skye mched rnams yin te de rnams kyis sa'i snying po la sogs pa yang mtshon par byed pa yin pas bcu gnyis rnams yin te drug mos pa la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin rnams ni 'phel bar byed pas skye mched rnams yin te de rnams kyis sa'i snying po la sogs pa yang mtshon par byed pa yin pas bcu gnyis rnams yin te drug mos pa la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of those is the sense bases, because they cause increase. Since those also indicate the essence of the earth and so on, there are twelve, because there is no certainty that the six are devoted to one.

original: rdo rje skye mched nyid ces pa la sogs pa ni gnas nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje skye mched nyid ces pa la sogs pa ni gnas nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The vajra sense bases and so on are not definite abodes.

original: snying po zhabs la sogs pa rgya cher 'grel pa byed pa thams cad kyis 'di ltar bshad pas so //
analyzed: snying po zhabs la sogs pa rgya cher 'grel pa byed pa thams cad kyis 'di ltar bshad pas so //
translated: All the commentators, such as Nāropa, explain it in this way.

original: sngar phyung ba'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams ji ltar rang gzhug par 'dod pa'i phyir dang yongs su ma rdzogs par dgos pa nges par srid pa'i phyir /🔽spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don //
analyzed: sngar phyung ba'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams ji ltar rang gzhug par 'dod pa'i phyir dang yongs su ma rdzogs par dgos pa nges par srid pa'i phyir / spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don //
translated: Since the essence of the earth and so on that were previously extracted are as one wishes, and since it is possible that the purpose is not complete,

original: phung po skye mched khams rnams yin //
analyzed: phung po skye mched khams rnams yin //
translated: the meaning of the aggregates, sense bases, and constituents is a heap, a gateway, and a type.

original: zhes pas gang rnams thams cad dpyad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pas gang rnams thams cad dpyad pa yin no //
translated: The aggregates, sense bases, and constituents are all analyzed.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams la yi ge kshi la sogs pa rnams kyis sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams la yi ge kshi la sogs pa rnams kyis sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The letters kṣa, etc. are the letters of Kṣitigarbha, etc. in the eyes, etc.

original: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams la yi ge dza: la sogs pa rnams kyis gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams la yi ge dza: la sogs pa rnams kyis gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams yin no //
translated: The letters jra, etc. are the letters of Rūpavajrā, etc. in the aggregate of form, etc.

original: sa'i khams la sogs pa rnams la yi ge lam la sogs pa rnams kyis spyan ma sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sa'i khams la sogs pa rnams la yi ge lam la sogs pa rnams kyis spyan ma sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The letters la, etc. are the letters of Locanā, etc. in the earth element, etc.

original: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams la yi ge bhr'um la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams la yi ge bhr'um la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyang ste /
translated: The letters bhrūṁ, etc. are the letters of Vairocana, etc. in the aggregate of form, etc.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnams yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnams yin no //
translated: They are the nature of emptiness.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pas spros pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pas spros pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: One should practice with the preliminaries of various elaborations, etc.

original: sgrub pa yang aom yig la sogs pa'i sngags las byung ba sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag po rnams spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa yang aom yig la sogs pa'i sngags las byung ba sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag po rnams spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the lords of the families, such as Body Vajra, who arise from the mantras of the letter oṁ, etc., with the preliminaries of emanating, etc.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pas bskul ba yang gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pas bskul ba yang gsungs so //
translated: The request by the Buddhas and so on is also stated.

original: bsgrub pa chen po'i dus su rang gi sngags rdo rje can gyi rang gi bdag po'i lha de'i gzugs de'i yang dbu rgyan du rigs kyi bdag po bsgoms pas ye shes rdo rje can sgrub pa pos 'grub ste dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa chen po'i dus su rang gi sngags rdo rje can gyi rang gi bdag po'i lha de'i gzugs de'i yang dbu rgyan du rigs kyi bdag po bsgoms pas ye shes rdo rje can sgrub pa pos 'grub ste dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: At the time of the great practice, the practitioner who has the knowledge-vajra, by meditating on the lord of his own deity in the form of that one, with the lord of the family in his crown, is successful, the stainless result.

original: snying gar mam ni zhes pa @96b la sogs pa nas brtsams te ji srid du /
analyzed: snying gar mam ni zhes pa @96b la sogs pa nas brtsams te ji srid du /
translated: Beginning from “at the heart, mam” and so on, up to

original: srid par chags pas srid mtha' yas /
analyzed: srid par chags pas srid mtha' yas /
translated: “If attached to existence, existence is endless.

original: zhi bar chags na 'byor nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: zhi bar chags na 'byor nyams 'gyur //
translated: If attached to peace, wealth declines.

original: sgyu mas bsnyen pa yang dag byas //
analyzed: sgyu mas bsnyen pa yang dag byas //
translated: Having properly attended through illusion,

original: chos dbyings bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
analyzed: chos dbyings bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
translated: one becomes of the nature of the realm of reality.

original: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Om dharmadhatusvabhava atmako’ham.

original: bshes gnyen dam pa rgyu mthun byas//
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa rgyu mthun byas//
translated: The cause is the excellent friend.

original: smin las thams cad mkhyen nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: smin las thams cad mkhyen nyid 'gyur //
translated: From that, all-knowledge is produced.

original: des ni mig sogs byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: des ni mig sogs byin brlabs pa //
translated: By that, the consecration of the eyes and so on

original: nye bar sgrub pa yin par 'dod //
analyzed: nye bar sgrub pa yin par 'dod //
translated: is asserted to be the near practice.

original: sa snying rdo rje nam mkha'i snying //
analyzed: sa snying rdo rje nam mkha'i snying //
translated: Kṣitigarbha, Vajra, Ākāśagarbha,

original: 'jig dbang sgrib sel gun du bzang //
analyzed: 'jig dbang sgrib sel gun du bzang //
translated: Śakra, Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin, Mañjuśrī,

original: mig la sogs pa yang dag dgang //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa yang dag dgang //
translated: and the pure eye, etc.

original: sa bon de yi skyes bu byed //
analyzed: sa bon de yi skyes bu byed //
translated: are the seed syllables, the agent of production.🔽The dharmakāya, saṃbhogakāya, nirmāṇakāya,

original: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni bskyed pa po //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni bskyed pa po //
translated: and the producer of the benefit of beings,

original: thugs kyi gsang sogs byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: thugs kyi gsang sogs byin gyis brlab //
translated: the consecration of the secret mind, etc.

original: de las sgrub pa'i don du 'gyur //
analyzed: de las sgrub pa'i don du 'gyur //
translated: from that, the meaning of accomplishment will arise.

original: rang snying lkog ma'i spyi bo'i zlar //
analyzed: rang snying lkog ma'i spyi bo'i zlar //
translated: In one’s heart, throat, and crown,

original: h'um a'a:aom byung yang dag gtsor //
analyzed: h'um a'a:aom byung yang dag gtsor //
translated: from hūṃ, aḥ, and oṃ, the perfect principal,

original: rdo rje chu skyes 'khor lo yis //
analyzed: rdo rje chu skyes 'khor lo yis //
translated: the vajra, lotus, and wheel,

original: dbus gnas thugs sogs gsang ba bsgom //
analyzed: dbus gnas thugs sogs gsang ba bsgom //
translated: meditate on the secret mind, etc., in the center.

original: de thugs shes rab yan lag 'dus //
analyzed: de thugs shes rab yan lag 'dus //
translated: That mind is the union of the branches of wisdom,

original: 'od kyi gzugs sogs rdo rje yi //
analyzed: 'od kyi gzugs sogs rdo rje yi //
translated: the form of light, etc., the vajra,

original: 'od kyis phyogs dus kun mchod cing //
analyzed: 'od kyis phyogs dus kun mchod cing //
translated: with light, offering to all directions and times,

original: ma lus gtso la khyab pa yis //
analyzed: ma lus gtso la khyab pa yis //
translated: pervading the principal without exception.

original: de ni mdzad pa don rdzogs te //
analyzed: de ni mdzad pa don rdzogs te //
translated: That is the accomplishment of the meaning of activity.

original: gang rnams snying lkog spyi bor zhugs //
analyzed: gang rnams snying lkog spyi bor zhugs //
translated: Those that enter the heart, throat, and crown,

original: de ni thugs kyi rdo rje sogs //
analyzed: de ni thugs kyi rdo rje sogs //
translated: are the vajra of mind, etc.

original: byin brlabs de ni rab tu bsgrub //
analyzed: byin brlabs de ni rab tu bsgrub //
translated: That consecration is accomplished.

original: gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid lta //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid lta //
translated: The characteristics of the three secrets.

original: sgyu ma'i shes rab yan lag 'dus //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i shes rab yan lag 'dus //
translated: The branches of illusory wisdom gathered,

original: dbang 'bras chung du rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: dbang 'bras chung du rnam dag phyir //
translated: The result of the small empowerment is pure,

original: sgrub pa chen po yin par 'dod //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po yin par 'dod //
translated: Therefore, it is asserted to be the great accomplishment.

original: ye shes sems thugs snying 'od kyis //
analyzed: ye shes sems thugs snying 'od kyis //
translated: The light of the heart of the wisdom mind

original: phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang dag bskul //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang dag bskul //
translated: Fully invokes the lords of the ten directions.

original: de 'od las byung rig ma rnams //
analyzed: de 'od las byung rig ma rnams //
translated: The knowledge consorts that arise from that light

original: bdud rtsis chus gang bum bsnams pas //
analyzed: bdud rtsis chus gang bum bsnams pas //
translated: Hold vases filled with the water of nectar.

original: gtso bo dpal ldan rang dbang bskur //
analyzed: gtso bo dpal ldan rang dbang bskur //
translated: The principal one is empowered by the glorious one.

original: rigs bdag cod pan dam pa yin //
analyzed: rigs bdag cod pan dam pa yin //
translated: The lord of the family is the excellent crown.

original: 'di rnams de srid du chung ngu'i yan lag bzhi rnams thabs gtso bor gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thabs kyi cha la brten pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rnams de srid du chung ngu'i yan lag bzhi rnams thabs gtso bor gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thabs kyi cha la brten pa rnams so //
translated: These are the four branches of the small empowerment, which are the methods that are the main part of the samādhi that is based on the aspect of method.

original: bar ma shes rab kyi char gtogs pa rnams gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: bar ma shes rab kyi char gtogs pa rnams gang gsungs pa /
translated: The medium empowerment is the part that belongs to the wisdom empowerment, which is stated:

original: de bzhin rgyu mthun sogs par mos //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyu mthun sogs par mos //
translated: Likewise, the cause, and so on, is ascertained.

original: rang 'od shes rab rnam par sbyang //
analyzed: rang 'od shes rab rnam par sbyang //
translated: One’s light is purified as wisdom.

original: chen po'i dkyil 'khor par gtogs pa rnams gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: chen po'i dkyil 'khor par gtogs pa rnams gang gsungs pa /
translated: The great empowerment is the part that belongs to the maṇḍala, which is stated:

original: 'khor lo mig dang sku sogs kyis //
analyzed: 'khor lo mig dang sku sogs kyis //
translated: By the wheel, eye, body, etc.

original: dbang bskur sngon bzhin byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: dbang bskur sngon bzhin byin brlabs pa //
translated: The consecration is as before, the consecration.

original: rgyun mthun la sogs byin brlabs pa //🔽chen pos de @97a * //
analyzed: rgyun mthun la sogs byin brlabs pa // chen pos de @97a * //
translated: The consecration of the stream of syllables, etc.

original: ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ni bsgom par bya //
translated: The great one should meditate on that.

original: zhes so // 'di nyid ni dbyer med pa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gsum la khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'di nyid ni dbyer med pa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gsum la khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the pervasion of the three indivisible vajra samadhis.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: rgyu mthun sogs la lhag mos pas //
analyzed: rgyu mthun sogs la lhag mos pas //
translated: By the superior devotion to the stream of syllables, etc.

original: thig le phra mo gsang gsum mo //
analyzed: thig le phra mo gsang gsum mo //
translated: The subtle drop of the three secrets

original: chung sogs dbye bas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: chung sogs dbye bas bsgom par bya //
translated: is meditated on by the divisions of small, etc.

original: de bzhin sbyor ba bsnyen pa bzhin //
analyzed: de bzhin sbyor ba bsnyen pa bzhin //
translated: Likewise, the service is like the yoga.

original: thun mong pa dang mchog gi dbye bas bsnyen pa ni rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: thun mong pa dang mchog gi dbye bas bsnyen pa ni rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The service is twofold, by the division of the common and the supreme.

original: de la mchog gi bsnyen pa ni ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zla ba zhu ba nye bar len par gyur pas bya'o //
analyzed: de la mchog gi bsnyen pa ni ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zla ba zhu ba nye bar len par gyur pas bya'o //
translated: There, the supreme service is done by the appropriation of the melting moon of the nectar of wisdom.

original: rtag tu ni thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni thams cad du'o //
translated: Always is in all circumstances.

original: nyid kyi tshig gis ni sdud pa'i don yin pas sbyor ba'i yan lag drug po rgyud phyi mar bshad pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: nyid kyi tshig gis ni sdud pa'i don yin pas sbyor ba'i yan lag drug po rgyud phyi mar bshad pas kyang ngo //
translated: The word itself has the meaning of inclusion, so the six branches of service are also explained in the Later Tantra.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyis te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sngags dang shes rab dang thabs kyi bde ba chen po'i de kho na nyid dang sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi don yang yin no//
analyzed: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyis te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i sngags dang shes rab dang thabs kyi bde ba chen po'i de kho na nyid dang sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi don yang yin no//
translated: This is the meaning of all mantras, of all the Tathagatas' mantras such as HŪṀ, and of the reality of the great bliss of wisdom and means, and it is the meaning of all sentient beings without exception.

original: de'i phyir sgrub pa po dam pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub pa po dam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, one is a supreme adept.

original: yang na zhes pa ni sdud pa ste rdo rje bzhi dag gis kyang zhes rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i thun mong ba'i bsnyen pa bya ste brtan pa'i rig pa la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis so //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ni sdud pa ste rdo rje bzhi dag gis kyang zhes rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i thun mong ba'i bsnyen pa bya ste brtan pa'i rig pa la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis so //
translated: Or else, the continuation of the tantra explains that one should perform the common service with the four vajras, that is, with the observances of a firm knowledge woman, etc.

original: yan lag bzhi po de rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid shes rab dang thabs bde ba chen po ste de dang ldan pa rnams ni thun mtshams bzhi ru rab tu sbyor ba ni thun mong ba dang mchog gi dngos grub thob par
analyzed: yan lag bzhi po de rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid shes rab dang thabs bde ba chen po ste de dang ldan pa rnams ni thun mtshams bzhi ru rab tu sbyor ba ni thun mong ba dang mchog gi dngos grub thob par
translated: Those who know the three vajras, the reality of the mantra, and the great bliss of wisdom and means, and who are endowed with that, should practice in the four periods of the day.

original: 'gyur te / gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gyur te / gang gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: nyi ma so sor thun bzhi ru //
analyzed: nyi ma so sor thun bzhi ru //
translated: In each day, in four periods,

original: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan pa //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan pa //
translated: endowed with the yoga of the three samadhis,

original: gyur nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: gyur nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should practice for the attainment of power.

original: thun mong mchog gi dngos po ni //
analyzed: thun mong mchog gi dngos po ni //
translated: The common and supreme powers🔽are attained in the four periods of the day and night.

original: zhes so // de la nub mo'i zhi ba dang nyin par gyi dang po'i thun gyi mtha' dang po'i phyed dag ni dang po'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de la nub mo'i zhi ba dang nyin par gyi dang po'i thun gyi mtha' dang po'i phyed dag ni dang po'o //
translated: In this regard, the first period is the first half of the first period of the night and the first period of the day.

original: nyin par gyi thun gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag gi mtha' dag gi mtha' ma dang po'i phyed dag ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: nyin par gyi thun gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag gi mtha' dag gi mtha' ma dang po'i phyed dag ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second period is the second half of the first period of the day and the second half of the first period of the night.

original: nyin par gyi bzhi pa dang mtshan mo'i thun gyi mtha' dang dang po'i phyed dag ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: nyin par gyi bzhi pa dang mtshan mo'i thun gyi mtha' dang dang po'i phyed dag ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third period is the first half of the third period of the night and the first half of the third period of the day.

original: nub mo'i gnyis pa dang thun gsum pa'i mtha' dang dang po'i phyed dag ni bzhi pa'i thun no //
analyzed: nub mo'i gnyis pa dang thun gsum pa'i mtha' dang dang po'i phyed dag ni bzhi pa'i thun no //
translated: The fourth period is the second half of the third period of the night and the second half of the third period of the day.

original: de rnams la mchog tu sbyor nas rab tu sbyor ba ste shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa des so //
analyzed: de rnams la mchog tu sbyor nas rab tu sbyor ba ste shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa des so //
translated: One should practice in those periods, applying oneself to the supreme, by means of the meditative concentration of wisdom and means.

original: rang 'od kyi rig ma'i @97b gnas rnam pa lnga rnams ni mgo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba dang brla dang rkang pa la thug pa rnams su so so'i rdul phra rab rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rang 'od kyi rig ma'i @97b gnas rnam pa lnga rnams ni mgo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba dang brla dang rkang pa la thug pa rnams su so so'i rdul phra rab rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The five places of the knowledge-goddess of one's own light are the head, heart, navel, genitals, and thighs, and the atoms of each are Vairochana, etc.

original: ye shes rdo rje'i yi ge aom zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje'i yi ge aom zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: The syllable Om of the knowledge-vajra is a mere indication,

original: yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: so one should meditate on the knowledge-vajra of the syllable Hum, etc.

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa rnams la sgrib par byed pa'i phyir sdom pa yin te rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa rnams la sgrib par byed pa'i phyir sdom pa yin te rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It is a vow because it screens off the obstacles to unexcelled enlightenment, and it is the definition of the observances of the knowledge.

original: blo dang ldan pas dngos po mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid dmigs pas 'jug pa ni rjes su bsgrub pa'o //🔽brtul zhugs chen pos thun bzhi ru //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas dngos po mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid dmigs pas 'jug pa ni rjes su bsgrub pa'o // brtul zhugs chen pos thun bzhi ru //
translated: The wise one's entry into the observation of the reality of all things is the subsequent performance.🔽In four sessions the wise one

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya //
translated: should perform the secret worship with the great observance.

original: zhes bcu drug pa las so //
analyzed: zhes bcu drug pa las so //
translated: This is from the sixteenth chapter.

original: de nas mtshan ma thob pas myur zhing mgyogs par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas mtshan ma thob pas myur zhing mgyogs par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having obtained the sign, one will quickly and rapidly obtain power.

original: rgyas pa ni zla ba la sogs pas dge ba'i tshogs ma rdzogs pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'i don du nyin par dbye bas bskul bar ngas brjod do //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni zla ba la sogs pas dge ba'i tshogs ma rdzogs pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'i don du nyin par dbye bas bskul bar ngas brjod do //
translated: I have explained the extensive [rite] by the division of the day for the purpose of increasing the merit of the accumulation of virtue by the moon, etc.

original: sems brtan pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas ni zla ba phyed kyi nang du grub par bshad do //
analyzed: sems brtan pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas ni zla ba phyed kyi nang du grub par bshad do //
translated: It is explained that [one] will be accomplished within half a month by the accumulation of the accumulation of merit arisen from a stable mind.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: gsang ba yang yin pas gang las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba de dpal gsang ba 'dus pa der ro//
analyzed: gsang ba yang yin pas gang las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba de dpal gsang ba 'dus pa der ro//
translated: In the glorious Guhyasamaja, which is secret and from which the glorious Vajrasattva arises.

original: nye ba'i bsgrub pa nyid ni sdom pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i bsgrub pa nyid ni sdom pa'o //
translated: The near attainment itself is the vow.

original: bde ba skyed par byed pa dang rang gi rnam par gtod pa dag las yul gang yin pa bsgrub pa yan lag ste de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba skyed par byed pa dang rang gi rnam par gtod pa dag las yul gang yin pa bsgrub pa yan lag ste de de bzhin no //
translated: The branch of attainment is the object from the generation of bliss and the dedication to oneself, and that is just so.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin par byed pas de 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin par byed pas de 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the retention because it causes the retention of that as the nature of the emanation body of the Buddha.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dbyer med par bsgoms pas byin gyis brlab par byed pa ni sku rdo rje ste de'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar 'khor lo'i zla ba'i aom yig las phyung ste sems can gyi don
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dbyer med par bsgoms pas byin gyis brlab par byed pa ni sku rdo rje ste de'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar 'khor lo'i zla ba'i aom yig las phyung ste sems can gyi don
translated: One should bless the body vajra and so on, the three, by meditating on their indivisibility with emptiness.

original: ma lus pa byas pa la de las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas mchod pa de'i byin gyis rlob pas byon te de nyid du thim pa ni brtan pa'i dngos po ste de nyid phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gnas so
analyzed: ma lus pa byas pa la de las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas mchod pa de'i byin gyis rlob pas byon te de nyid du thim pa ni brtan pa'i dngos po ste de nyid phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gnas so
translated: Having performed the benefit of all sentient beings, having arisen from the moon of the wheel at the heart of the gnosis being at the heart of the body vajra, having made offerings to the form vajra and so on that arose from that, having blessed that, having arrived, and having dissolved into that very place, that is the stable entity, because that is the basis of all perfections.

original: // de la deng ni de lta ste bdag ni kho bo'i sku rdo rjer mdzod cig //
analyzed: // de la deng ni de lta ste bdag ni kho bo'i sku rdo rjer mdzod cig //
translated: In that regard, now, in that way, I am the body vajra of the master.

original: gsol ba gdab pa gnyis pa'i rjes la phyogs bcu rnams su sems can gyi don ma lus pa @98a * //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa gnyis pa'i rjes la phyogs bcu rnams su sems can gyi don ma lus pa @98a * //
translated: After the second supplication, in the ten directions, having performed the benefit of all sentient beings, having arisen from the moon of the wheel at the heart of the gnosis being at the heart of the body vajra, having made offerings to the form vajra and so on that arose from that, having blessed that, having arrived, and having dissolved into that very place, that is the stable entity, because that is the basis of all perfections.

original: bsgrub pa'i ched du zhugs pa gang rnams thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams dang / de yang gsol ba gdab pa dang po'i rjes la rnal 'byor pa des sku rdo rje mtshon par byas pa de nyid du byon nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzad pa rnams dang de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i ched du zhugs pa gang rnams thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams dang / de yang gsol ba gdab pa dang po'i rjes la rnal 'byor pa des sku rdo rje mtshon par byas pa de nyid du byon nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzad pa rnams dang de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa'o //
translated: and also those who, after the first supplication, have come to that very place of consecration by the yogi who has been made the sign of Body-vajra, and those who have made the place of consecration, and those who have declared the result.

original: sgrub pa yang yin la sdom pa yang yin zhing yul yang yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa yang yin la sdom pa yang yin zhing yul yang yin no //
translated: It is a practice, it is a vow, and it is an object.

original: chos ni gsung rdo rje yin la de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir gsung gtso bo yin la 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi lam ston pa po'o //
analyzed: chos ni gsung rdo rje yin la de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir gsung gtso bo yin la 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi lam ston pa po'o //
translated: Dharma is Speech-vajra, and because it is the Enjoyment Body, it is the chief of speech, and it is the teacher of the paths of those who have the characteristics of the Mahayana with its result.

original: gang gi lam las byung ba'i ngag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi lam las byung ba'i ngag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The place of consecration by the speech that has arisen from that path is called that.

original: sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa bsgom pa'i yul sngar bzhin du bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa bsgom pa'i yul sngar bzhin du bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: The object of meditation of the vow of the great practice is accomplished as before.

original: thugs rdo rje ni chos kyi yin te lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje ni chos kyi yin te lhag ma ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: The mind vajra is the Dharma, and the rest is as before.

original: de ltar byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab pa'i nges pa nyid kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par mdzad ces pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams brtan pa bskyed pa yin par sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab pa'i nges pa nyid kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par mdzad ces pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams brtan pa bskyed pa yin par sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the certainty of the supplication for consecration is that the vajra body and so forth consecrate. This is said by the buddhas in order to generate firmness in the yogis.

original: gti mug gi bdag nyid ni rtog pa med par yang yod pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug gi bdag nyid ni rtog pa med par yang yod pa'o //
translated: The nature of delusion is to exist without conceptualization.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig nyid bsgrub pa ste mchog yin la de ston par byed pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig nyid bsgrub pa ste mchog yin la de ston par byed pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The commitment of the union of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all transcendent lords is the supreme accomplishment, and the teaching of that is also so.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the twelfth chapter of the Sri-Guhyasamaja Ornament.

original: // / de nas zhes pa la /
analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa la /
translated: Then,

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
translated: in the center of the vajra mandala,

original: yi ge aom ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: yi ge aom ni bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the syllable Om.

original: zhes brjod pa de la cig gzhan bsgom par bya ba yin nam zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa nges pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa de la cig gzhan bsgom par bya ba yin nam zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa nges pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: The reply to that is What else is to be cultivated? and so on.

original: ye shes nyid ni ye shes lnga 'am rnam par byang ba'i phung po lnga ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ye shes nyid ni ye shes lnga 'am rnam par byang ba'i phung po lnga ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The knowledge itself is the vajra, the five knowledges or the five aggregates of enlightenment.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog yin la de bdag nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog yin la de bdag nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is supreme because it is the nature of stainless wisdom and method, the nature of great bliss, and it is the grasping of that nature.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa dang ldan pa lam gyi gnas skabs dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyang de'i don nyid du yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa dang ldan pa lam gyi gnas skabs dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyang de'i don nyid du yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is the arising of the path and the result for the sake of all sentient beings, and it is the arising of the result for the sake of that.

original: mi slob pa'i sku gsung thugs las nyid kyi go rims ji lta bar thub @98b pa gsum zhes chos mngon pa las brjod pa sku dang gsung dang thugs thub pa'i phyir na thub pa'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa'i sku gsung thugs las nyid kyi go rims ji lta bar thub @98b pa gsum zhes chos mngon pa las brjod pa sku dang gsung dang thugs thub pa'i phyir na thub pa'o //
translated: The three silences of body, speech, and mind of the nonlearner are the three silences, as they are called in the Abhidharma, because they are the silence of body, speech, and mind.

original: tshad ma dang lung gis mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje yin la dbyangs ni sgrogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma dang lung gis mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje yin la dbyangs ni sgrogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is not divided by valid cognition and scripture, and it is a song because it is endowed with proclamation.

original: sngags kyi stobs las byung ba'i tshul ni brjod ma thag pa'i yan lag bzhi dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: sngags kyi stobs las byung ba'i tshul ni brjod ma thag pa'i yan lag bzhi dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The method that arises from the power of mantra is the characteristic of the four branches and the three samadhis that were just mentioned.

original: tshad ma dang lung gi yul rnams la de rnams kyis mi gnod pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa'i phyir 'tshe ba med pa dang yang dag pa'i don dang rang bzhin gyis yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma dang lung gi yul rnams la de rnams kyis mi gnod pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa'i phyir 'tshe ba med pa dang yang dag pa'i don dang rang bzhin gyis yin te /
translated: Because it is not harmed by those in the objects of valid cognition and scripture, and because it causes the attainment of unsurpassed bliss, it is harmless and has the right meaning.🔽It is by nature

original: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
analyzed: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
translated: Because it is harmless and has the right meaning,

original: ngo bo nyid las phyir log gis //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid las phyir log gis //
translated: it is by nature

original: 'bad du zin kyang mi bzlog ste //
analyzed: 'bad du zin kyang mi bzlog ste //
translated: Even if one tries, it cannot be turned away

original: blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
analyzed: blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
translated: because the mind grasps that direction.

original: zhes rnam 'grel las te brten pa'o //
analyzed: zhes rnam 'grel las te brten pa'o //
translated: This is from the Pramanavarttika.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos dang longs spyod pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i lam yin pa'i phyir dang rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la thug pa chos dang byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos dang longs spyod pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i lam yin pa'i phyir dang rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la thug pa chos dang byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul
translated: Therefore, it is the path of the dharmakaya, sambhogakaya and nirmanakaya, and it is the way of Dharma, enlightenment and buddhahood, since it is the complete purity of the elements leading to enlightenment, such as the bases of miraculous powers, up to omniscience.🔽

original: te zhi pa'o //
analyzed: te zhi pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is the path of the dharmakaya, sambhogakaya, and nirmanakaya, and since it is the method of the Dharma, enlightenment, and buddhahood, which are the complete purity of all aspects of the factors of enlightenment and so on up to omniscience, it is peace.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ma skyes pa rnams te /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ma skyes pa rnams te /
translated: It is the non-arising of the aspects of apprehended and apprehender.

original: rang bzhin khyad par du gyur pa rtog pa med pa bsgom par bya ba'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes skye bar rab tu bsgrags pa yin pa des na ngo mtshar ba yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin khyad par du gyur pa rtog pa med pa bsgom par bya ba'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes skye bar rab tu bsgrags pa yin pa des na ngo mtshar ba yin te /
translated: Since the transformation of the basis, which is the non-conceptual wisdom of the yogis and yoginis that arises in the mirror-like wisdom and so on with respect to the phenomena to be cultivated, is renowned as being amazing,

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽gang zag yang na chos rnams kyis //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / gang zag yang na chos rnams kyis //
translated: therefore,🔽the emptiness of non-entity

original: dngos med 'dir ni stong pa nyid //
analyzed: dngos med 'dir ni stong pa nyid //
translated: is the emptiness of non-entity.

original: de yi dngos med dngos yod pas //
analyzed: de yi dngos med dngos yod pas //
translated: The entity of that non-entity

original: de ni stong pa nyid gzhan yin //
analyzed: de ni stong pa nyid gzhan yin //
translated: is another emptiness.

original: zhes rgyal ba byams pas brjod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bos gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes rgyal ba byams pas brjod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bos gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the Victor Maitreya has said this, and because of the nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of things, it is the nature of nonduality.

original: skye ba dang mi skye ba dag phan tshun yongs su spangs pas gnas pa nyid kyis 'gal ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: skye ba dang mi skye ba dag phan tshun yongs su spangs pas gnas pa nyid kyis 'gal ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because arising and nonarising are mutually exclusive, they are contradictory.🔽And also:

original: gang yang / tshad mas rab tu ma grub phyir //
analyzed: gang yang / tshad mas rab tu ma grub phyir //
translated: Because it is not established by valid cognition,

original: don dam du ni skye ba med //
analyzed: don dam du ni skye ba med //
translated: there is no arising ultimately.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten rab grags pas//
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten rab grags pas//
translated: But just as it is well known in the world,

original: slar yang kun rdzob tu skye bas //
analyzed: slar yang kun rdzob tu skye bas //
translated: arising is again in the relative.

original: de'i gnas tha dad pa yin pas mi 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i gnas tha dad pa yin pas mi 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Since its basis is different, there is no contradiction.

original: gang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis /
analyzed: gang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis /
translated: As Āryadeva said:

original: skyes pa'ang skye ba ma yin te //
